I have cut through some decent size branches without a problem.The blades have a mechanism where you can lock them by sliding a little piece over.The only issues I have had are that the handles can be a bit wide and don't always push back open smoothly, as maybe the tension could be a little stronger.I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

I do all the yardwork (other than mowing) at my house, and I also work doing gardening as a side job, and I work in a greenhouse.  So needless to say I go through a lot of garden gloves.I like that these gloves come in a 2-pack. The reality is that I go through garden gloves, or I misplace them, or leave a pair outside - so it is nice to have an extra pair.These gloves are a thin, stretchy material with a rubbery palm.  I like the thin material, which is comfortable and gives me the dexterity I need.  The rubberized portion is very grippy, really sticking to things like weeds as I am pulling them out.  It is nice to be able to get a good grip on things between having dexterity and the rubbery grip.The thin material is great in the summer when you  hand can breathe.  Granted your palms will be more sweaty underneath the rubberized palm, but these are so thin and lightweight.The only issue I have is that these are the slightest bit small for me, but I am tall and have long fingers.  However, the size doesn't affect my being able to wear them for yardwork, weeding, pruning, vegetable gardening, etc.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We love natural products, and my daughter has eczema, plus this product is great for other skin ailments.This comes in a little glass jar, and I love that it is eco-friendly and no leaching from plastics.The salve is very firm, so I dig out a little chunk with my fingertip or fingernail and spread on my skin (or my daughter's eczema).  It warms up and works into skin nicely.  I usually apply this before bed, even to my face.The Super Balm has a nice, light, natural scent to it.  I like not having to worry about synthetic fragrances!I received a discount on this product in exchange for my honest review.  I love natural products and the timing couldn't be more perfect, just in time for winter.  I use this on things like scrapes from gardening and callouses from raking leaves, dry skin, etc.

This has been a great desk lamp.  It has an interesting design where it folds into a compact bar.  This would be great if you need a lamp to travel with, like if you have a booth or display at a show and need a portable light.The lamp is easy to set up.  The light portion simply lifts up, and is completely positionable.  The bottom twists to become the base.  There is a marking right on the bottom of the lamp so you know right where to twist the base, so there is no confusion.I like the color of the light - it doesn't seem as stark as some lights, and has a warmer feel to it.  There are three settings of brightness, and the light panel has a cover on it, so you can't see the individual LEDs.  Since the lamp can be positioned easily, you can make sure the light isn't shining in your eyes.  I like the power button, which is a spot at the base of the lamp that you tap.The base is small, but the lamp has some decent weight to it.  So although it is a little top heavy, tipping has never been an issue where it sits on my desk.  If you place it on an uneven surface or somewhere it could get bumped, there is the possibility of tipping.  I wouldn't give this to the kids (like my first grader) for her desk, just because the kids are probably careless enough where it could tip.The lamp is easy to charge, with either a USB cord or an AC adapter.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We use a lot of devices, so keeping them charged can be a handle.  Plus, I need to make sure my phone is always charged as I am the main contact person for the kids.  Portable backup battery chargers are a must.This portable battery charger has the features I look for:~ slim design - this slides right into a purse or a pocket.  It has nice rounded edges that help not catch on things.~ charging indicator - there are lights to indicate when this is charging~ decent charging power at 6400mAhThe charger is easy to use, and because it shows you how much power is remaining, there is no guesswork.There is also a built-in LED flashlight, which is a bonus feature.  I don't know how much we will actually use it, perhaps maybe when we go camping.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We do a lot of cooking and a good oven mitt is a must.  These mitts have a silicone construction which extends up by the wrist, so it protects against heat and things like steam burns. I love silicone oven mitts because you don't have to worry if you get them wet. I also use them for things like holding hot foods (such as peeling blanched foods or potatoes).These mitts are nice and flexible. We have had a variety of mitts that are really stiff, which make me concerned about having the dexterity to be able to hold on to hot pans properly. These are soft enough so I feel like I can grab things with a good grip.The size is good for me as well, slightly small for my husband, but usable nonetheless.I received these gloves in exchange for my honest review

I do a lot of crafts with my kids, so that being said, I am not much of a crocheter, but my kids make a lot of rubberband crafts. When I saw this set, I knew this would be a vast improvement over the cheap plastic or metal crochet hooks I have been using.This set comes packaged in a plastic box, which you can use for storage. Each hook has the size marked on the handle, with a range of sizes. I generally use the smallest one, but when we have projects where I need to grab large bunches of rubberbands, I switch up to a different size.The handles are so comfortable and I wish I had these years ago. I went from trying to grip a thin metal rod that dug into my fingers and was slippery. If you've ever done rubberband looms and tried to be precise and pull a big group of rubberbands over a peg, it is a lot of work. The handles on these add a little size to the handles, as well as rubberized comfort and non-slip grip. Plus, since these have a nice sturdy metal construction, no issues with these bending (compared to plastic hooks).Overall, I love this set! I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We go through a lot of trash bags, from household garbage cans to cat litter.  This is a nice big roll of trash bags, with 120 total.These trash bags have to be ripped off the roll, and they seem to rip off nicely.  Not like the rolls where you try to tear off a bag and it ends up tearing the bag.These bags are a translucent blue color.  You can see the trash through them, but that's not an issue for us.The bags hold up well - the plastic is thicker than some bags we have used, but not stretchy.  I was surprised when I was putting a large, thick envelope into the trash bag and was sure the corner had torn a long hole down the side of the bag - but it didn't show any sign that I could have easily torn the bag open.Overall, a handy roll of trash bags to have.  I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We do a lot of outdoor adventures, including boat trips and kayaking, plus days at the beach.  This is a very useful dry bag to have on hand.This seems about on par with other dry bags we have used.  The instructions are printed right on the top of the bag, which is nice (to roll and clip).The bag is made of all one material, and comes with a shoulder strap you can attach to the bag.Although we don't plan on submerging the bag, it is useful for storage in situations where things could get wet - for example, gear you don't want to get splashed as people get in and out of the boat, or strapping this to the kayak.  I think this would be useful too at the beach when you don't want wet or sandy things mixing with stuff you want to keep dry.I haven't tested this as far as submerging it, but we did run it under water to check the seams etc.  The top rolls just fine to create a seal as well.Overall, a good dry bag, and I actually like the small size.  Whereas the bigger ones might be more useful on a bigger scale, I picture using this for myself on a trip to the beach!  Will update when I can a picture of this on the kayak/boat/beach.I received a discount on this product in exchange for my honest review.

My kids LOVE Beanie Boos, and they both have a collection, so they were super excited when this game arrived.This is a cute, simple game.  It is recommended for kids ages 3-6, and is for 2-6 players.  It is easy to figure out the rules of play and set up the game.  Out of the box, we had to stick numbers on the die and pop a cardboard "Peanut" Beanie Boo in a little holder.There is a main playing board, and each player chooses a board with a Beanie Boo character.  Everyone takes turn rolling the die (we always start with the youngest player).  Depending on the shape you land on, you pick that shape piece and see if it matches the color and shape you need on your board.  First person to fill their three shapes wins the game.My kids were super excited to get this game.  It sets up so quickly and is very easy to understand, so there is no confusion when it comes to playing.  That also makes it great for playing with friends, especially because the kids can explain it.  With almost no setup time, the kids can be playing in no time.For younger kids, this is a great way to reinforce skills like matching colors and shapes.  It can also be a bit of a memory game if you see a piece someone has picked up that you either need or are trying to avoid picking up.The game can surprisingly take a while to complete.  When we first got it, I had thought the game play might be over in just a matter of minutes, but the game can stretch on for a while.  There were times the kids were impatient for the game to end, but only because they were being impatient, as I felt the game play time was good.If your kids are younger and more easily frustrated, there were occasions we sorted out game pieces as they were revealed to both reduce frustration and also to speed up the game.  In other words, the pieces the kids didn't want to pick up again went face down on a certain part of the board so that they didn't pick up the same ones over and over.  Alternatively, you could make it more challenging, and put the pieces back and mix them up so that it is less about memory and more about chance.Overall, this is a cute game especially if your kids are into Beanie Boos!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

My daughter is obsessed with My Little Pony, so I gave these to her as a reward. We had heard of surprise eggs before, so she was really excited when she saw these!These are "Sweets & Surprises" eggs, so each egg has candy and a non-candy treat. The candies we received in our eggs are small pink hearts. We had different non-candy treats - a necklace, ring, and a pencil topper - as well as a sticker in each egg. The My Little Pony toys are very cute, all with MLP images on them.The eggs are shrink wrapped with plastic, and the candy is also sealed inside.There is information on the wrapper as well as on an insert, but I had trouble finding the ingredients because the information is listed in so many languages. However, I was never able to find any allergy information (as my daughter has a peanut allergy), so she was very unhappy to be told she could not have the candies. (She can't have products processed/manufactured in a facility that processes nuts, which is often the case with candies, so I'm not sure if I can give these to her).These eggs are cute and definitely a hit with the kids, but the price is a little steep especially if you wanted a large quantity for things like favors or Easter eggs (which we are used to doing but at a cheaper price point). Overall, a super cute idea especially if your kids are really into My Little Pony!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

My kids were so excited when this remote control car arrived.I was concerned when I took the toy out of the package, as the exterior of the car is a very thin plastic.  However, it has not been an issue even with the kids crashing the car into things.  There is a bumper on the front and back, but I am still cautious when the kids are rough with it.Setup is fairly easy: the remote requires four AA batteries.  Also you need to remove the compartment *using a mini screwdriver) on the bottom of the car to find the antenna for the remote control, as well as the charger and rechargeable battery.  The battery charges by plugging into a USB adapter, which I plug right into my computer.  I like that it has an indicator light to show when it is done charging.The "Predator" is easy to use.  You use a pointer finger to move the toy forward or to go in reverse.  There is a wheel on the side of the remote that you use to steer.  The controls are easy enough to use, but the car goes very fast, so it can be hard for younger kids to control it.As far as performance, this toy does well.  It has nice big tires with grip on them, and so the car powers over carpet and other things, from feet to stuff the kids leave on the floor.  The first day we had this, my daughter drove it right over the cat's wet food bowl, so I had to wash the tires!There are two small things I would improve about this product:~ I wish the screw to the compartment cover on the bottom of the car would stay attached to the compartment when you unscrew it (some toys have this feature).~ There is no speed control on this.  It is either on or off - fast or not moving at all.Overall, this has been a really fun toy, and it cruises around the house easily over all the stuff the kids leave laying around!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We use microfiber towels a lot, as we have two kids and are an active family.  This is a nice size towel for a variety of things, from swimming to kayaking and hiking.This towel is nice for one, because it is very absorbent.  Trips to the beach/pool/etc. often become big hassles as far as having to lug so many towels, especially when the kids are in and out of the water.  The Wanderluxe Towel is a small size but absorbs very well.The towel has a very soft, smooth feel.  The tightly woven construction gives the fabric a smooth texture, and not one to pick up particles (sand, dirt etc), which is a must.I also like that there is a loop for hanging it up, which really comes in handy for showering at the campground and so on.  It doesn't have a stretchy loop for rolling up and storing, but it comes with a nice drawstring bag that is partly mesh to allow for ventilation.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I have been using natural products for a while now, but toothpaste was one of those things that took me a while to find an alternative.  I have tried a few tooth powders before, and this is probably the third one I have tried out.This is a powder in a small plastic tub (my others come in a tub and a squeeze container).  I wet my toothbrush and dip it in.The powder is very light grey and is darker when wet.  It has an interesting taste, but is overall quite mild. Reading through the ingredients, I thought some of the flavors might be too strong, but this is a mild combination of flavors, and I like that there are no overpowering flavors like mint or cinnamon.  This does have a natural taste to it, sort of earthy but fresh.I do feel like this does a good job cleaning my teeth, and leaves my mouth feeling fresh and my teeth looking whiter.  Interesting how it turns a dark grey in my mouth but washes clean.  There are a few gritty bits in the powder, but not a big deal at all.I am also hoping this helps with my teeth, as I have issues with my teeth and feel like I could use some extra nutrients in my mouth when I brush.I would say this is about the same as my other tooth powders, but with a much milder, more pleasant flavor, plus the benefits of activated charcoal.I received a discount on this product for my honest review.

I remember how tough it was to keep my kids busy when they were young, so I got this toy for my best friend's little one.  Staying at home can be a challenge, especially with winter on the way!  As soon as the Learn with Me Color Fun Fish Bowl arrived, we took it out and got down to some playing!The fishbowl comes with batteries, which is convenient especially if you are giving this as a gift.  No worrying about having to look for batteries.To use the toy, you insert fish in the top.  This can be a little frustrating for younger kids as you need to insert the fish a certain direction for the toy to work properly.  There are 10 fish and the toy talks as the fish are inserted, which helps kids learn their colors.  There are two modes, where the fishbowl either identifies the color fish, or it requests a color fish.This toy is good for traveling, since all the pieces store in the fishbowl.  We have also used it in the car, and except for my little one dropping a few fish here and there, is makes for good entertainment in the car.Once the fish are in the fish bowl, I wish it were a little easier to remove the fish.Overall, a fun toy for little ones, and helps with a variety of things from fine motor skills to learning colors.I received this toy in exchange for my honest review.

My husband and I both love coconut-scented products, so I was excited to give this a try.  This shampoo and conditioner set come nicely packaged.  I love the bottles, which have a nice design. The pump tops are very convenient and not messy, and the bottles don't tip easily.  It makes it easy with the kids as well - less mess and less waste.The shampoo has a nice lather and I feel like I get a nice clean without overdrying my hair.The conditioner does a great job of conditioning hair, making it easier to comb out and leaving it looking healthier.  My daughter has extremely thick hair and does a lot of swimming, and this has been a nice product to make her hair more manageable.Overall, both are great products, and it doesn't hurt they look nice in the shower too!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I wasn't familiar with Jade Gua Sha Massage tools, but was interested to give it a try.  I have terrible circulation and my job also means lots of time standing and doing physical work, so I can use help from the tool.This is a smooth piece of jade, and comfortable on the skin.  One side is scalloped but the rest has a smooth edge.  I like using this on parts of my feet and sore muscles like in the backs of my calves.  It helps when you feel tight in the back of your legs and need to work out knots (similar to if you were doing a lot of running).Although I am not familiar with any kind of professional massage techniques, this seems like a nicely designed tool.  I like to keep it on my nightstand and massage problem areas before bed (especially knowing it's back to the grind in the morning!).I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I love having lots of outdoor lighting, and these LED lights are perfect for the steps on my backyard patio.  They charge up during the day and go on automatically at dark.These have a nice appearance, and mount easily using screws (which it comes with).There is a switch on the back to turn them off or to have them turn on at night.The lights are nice and bright, but look great too, and are not too bright.  I like having the extra security of some light around the house.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I am always looking for ways to make lunch fun for my kids, and my daughter gets "jamwiches" at school which are like uncrustables you can buy at the store.  So I was hoping to find a tool to make them at home.I had to figure out how to use the tool.First we cut the bread with the outer (white) piece.  No problems - cut right through the bread.Next, we took the inner ring and pressed it down on the outer edges of the bread.  However, it didn't quite grip the edges of the bread enough to press them down and seal the bread into a pocket.  I wish it had a wider edge, as I'm guessing the bread we used was too thick (a whole wheat bread).Wish this worked better, and I'm guessing it works best on a thinner, more 'gluey' bread like a white bread.I received a discount on this product in exchange for my honest review.

For a while now, we have been saying we need a way to transport the kids artwork.  We were looking forward to trying out the US Art Supply tube.  There have been so many times that we needed a good way to get large poster size papers from one place to another, like an art show or handing in a school assignment.This tube is easy to use - the lid opens easily and twists to lock once in place.  You can also extend the length of the tube by twisting the inner tube and pulling it out to the length you want, and re-locking into place.  The instructions are right on the tube, as it is marked "LOCK" and has arrows to show how to open, etc.There is a carry strap, which also helps keep the lid from getting lost.The diameter of the tube is large enough so that either your papers don't have to be too tightly rolled, and/or you can put multiple items in the tube.This is the first storage tube we have tried, and it does the trick.  Gets large papers from point a to point b without any damages!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We love LED lights, and I have been intrigued with the little "fairy lights" I have seen in stores.  This light strand comes in lots of different colors, so I was torn between choosing white versus another color, but we settled on purple.This product does not come with batteries, and requires three AA batteries.  There is a little screw you can use to close the battery case, which is a nice feature especially if you have small children.These are tiny leds on a set of two copper wires.  The string is very small and delicate (not fragile), but the LEDs are surprisingly BRIGHT!You control the on/off from the battery panel, by sliding a switch.The copper wires that the lights are on can be bent how you like, and hold their shape, so you can "pose" these lights how you want.I love these LED lights!  They are smaller than other LED string lights we have, and I am planning on using them either in my daughter's school locker or on my mantle for decorating.  I used them on my fireplace mantle alongside my Halloween decorations, working them in to a Halloween "garland" I have.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I work in a garden shop and am always admiring the chimes that we have there at work.  So for the longest time, I have wanted some for my own place.The wind chimes I am used to are expensive, and on the heavy side (high quality Woodstock and Corinthian Bells). These Joseph Noelle are lighter in weight.  The tubes are a thinner material and unfortunately one of the tubes arrived bent.  The chimes are connected with a string, and one of the metal loops was not entirely closed, so I had to carefully loop the string back to the top to re-hang it.These chimes do sound a little bit "tinny", again compared to more expensive chimes. Each chime has a different note or tone, and the center piece is a pretty glass piece.  This is my favorite part - the diamond-shaped, amber glass.Pros:~ all metal/glass and will probably weather well (compared to ones that have wood parts)~ variety of tones~ inexpensiveCons:~ tinny sound~ bent chime and had to fix the cord & metal hookI received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I am not one to really be 'wowed' by a pair of headphones, but these are one of the few I have been impressed by!I chose the blue almost arbitrarily, and the look and design are very attractive.  There is blue fabric, almost like a thin denim, wrapped over the top of the headphones.These are heavy in my hand, and feel sturdy.  My 8 year old uses these with her laptop or the iPad, which is great for getting the kids to not fight (less arguing about how they can't hear over each other).The cord is covered in fabric as well.The ear cups are designed for comfort and have a nice big "L" and "R" inside the cups - great idea!  Since the cups fit over the ears, it helps reduce outside noise.These also fold, which does reduce some of the bulkiness.I received these headphones in exchange for an honest review.  I am surprised how nice these are - we really like them!

I have had the worst time getting my kids to do their chores!  We have tried everything.. reward jars, chore charts, etc.  So was excited to give this a try!First thing we had to do was a little "assembly", which was easy.  The kids were excited to help stick a variety of chore stickers to a plastic backing as well as the Velcro dots.The chart has a grid where you attach chores and stars, and then at the bottom there is a portion to write in with a dry-erase marker.Everything is provided - from stickers to stars, the dry erase marker, and even plastic baggies for storage!The only thing I have had a little bit of a challenge with is dividing up the chart.  There are three color columns, so I wasn't sure about dividing the chores up between two kids, or how to divide by day.  The best strategy for us is filling the first column with chores, and the other columns become the days of the week (Mon-Fri).This is so easy to use and very visually appealing and rewarding, since you can see the chores and the stars.  Since there are images associated with each chore, it is helpful for kids who aren't readers or strong readers quite yet.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

Seaweed Snack:Our family eats a lot of seaweed, and we are lucky that our 5-year-old loves roasted seaweed, because she is otherwise extremely picky about what she eats.  I would like her to eat a lot more fruits and vegetables, but seaweed is very healthy, so she enjoys a variety of seaweed, from roasted seaweed snacks to sushi.These seaweed snacks are a little different than our typical seaweed snacks, and consist of crispy, puffed rice, sandwiched between two strips of seaweed.  These have a nice seasoning to them, including soy sauce, sugar, and red pepper.  I was concerned these would be spicy, but they are just right.My 5-year-old ate the whole bag in one sitting - more like a matter of minutes.  She shared a few pieces with her sister and myself, and we all agreed that these snacks are really good.These are really tasty and healthy, and a very convenient snack.  They are made with simple, healthy ingredients, and I appreciate that these are all natural.Chocolate Snack:I wasn't sure what to expect from this little cacao snack, but I was intrigued when I poured little chocolate cubes out of the bag.  These are crispy little chocolate-y cubes, and taste amazing!Both my kids (age 5 and 8) weren't sure what I was "making" them eat when I offered these, but soon they were fighting to eat them all.These chocolate snacks have a wonderful light, crispy texture to them, while having a great chocolate flavor.  But they also aren't too heavy or sweet.  They make a nice, light snack and are absolutely delicious!I appreciate that these don't have artificial colors or other additives.  And a bonus - they are peanut safe, so my daughter can have them (always check labels).I received product samples in exchange for my honest review.

I always use packing cubes when we travel or go camping, as they really are a lifesaver for me with two kids.These have everything I look for in packing cubes:~ There is a mesh panel on the front, which allows you to see what is inside.  Plus it allows for ventilation and makes it easier to compress these in your luggage (instead of having air trapped in the cubes).~ Two zippers on each cube.  I don't like having to chase one zipper around a bag, so this is perfect for when I am busy and on the road.~ There is a handle on the top of each cube.  When we get to our destination, I sort cubes, so if the kids are in different rooms/tents/etc, I can easily carry these around and put the cubes by each person's bed (or sleeping bag!).These are made with a nice sturdy nylon material, and are a mid to large size bag.  I use these for shirts or the kids clothing, or you could put all your socks and undergarments in one of these.  Really great for sorting and storing your clothes when you travel!I received these packing cubes in exchange for my honest review.

My daughter is obsessed with My Little Pony, so she was very excited when this arrived in the mail.This product consists of a coloring book and stylus that looks like a crayon.There is a unique code inside the front cover of the coloring book, so you can download the Painting Lulu app for free and access the same My Little Pony coloring pages in the app.  Downloading the app and using the code was very easy.The coloring book is nice, with a thick cover and decent size pages (a little larger than your typical coloring book).  I like that the app has the same pages so that you can basically use the coloring book infinitely!  My kids both had fun using the coloring book and the app, sometimes at the same tie.My only complaint is that the stylus was really hard to use.  I had to push the stylus on the iPad really hard to get it to work - where the stylus was basically being mashed into the iPad.  It sort of defeats the purpose of the stylus (being able to be precise), and my daughter was frustrated right away and gave up and just used her fingers.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I remember having a collapsible cup as a kid for travel and I absolutely loved it!  I got this set for the family so that the kids would have something to use when we travel or go camping.These cups come as a set of three, and I got the blue/orange/pink set.  I like having the three colors so that we know whose cup is whose (however, the lids are identical, all with pink straps, so keep that in mind).The cups collapse easily enough and have a squared bottom.  The easiest way to collapse them is probably just pushing down on the top while they are on a counter.  They also pull open easily, but you have to have the lid off, otherwise it creates too much suction.The cups are entirely silicone except for a metal rim, and the snap-on lid is a firm plastic material.These aren't the biggest cups, but perfect for things like camping when it is time to brush teeth and rinse out.  I also like that this is silicone and I don't worry about leaching from plastics.  I would consider putting hot cocoa in these although I think for the most part we are sticking with water.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.  I love having these in our toiletry bag and the kids think they are a lot of fun!

Probiotics are very important to me, Love Bug probiotics are a great daily supplement.These tablets are fairly easy to take, at one per day (or two if needed).  These do have a more chalky coating, but I don't have a problem swallowing them.  I have never had any problems with stomach upset or side effects.The tablets come in a dark blue glass bottle, and mine also came with a cold pack.  Refrigeration is best, so I keep mine in the fridge.These probiotics have done well keeping my stomach happy and healthy.  I have better digestion and I haven't had any issues when I eat junk or I travel.  I always make sure I bring these with me when I travel!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

My daughter has really thick hair, and after a summer of sun and time at the pool, plus more swim lessons, her hair can use some serious conditioning.  While my hair has a tendency to look heavy and greasy, this is a good shampoo for her.I love the bottles, which have a nice design and a pump top.  They don't tip and you can dispense the shampoo and conditioner very neatly and easily.These both have a floral sort of scent to them.The shampoo has a nice lather, and the conditioner has good coverage. Her hair is smoother and less "puffy", and has a nice healthy appearance.I have no complaints about this product, although I wish it was more natural.  It has synthetic fragrances and a bunch of long names that are difficult to pronounce.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

These faucet extenders are such a great product for kids!  We have them in both bathrooms that the kids use.These are easy to "install" - you just slide them over the faucet, and they are adjustable as far as how far they stick out and the angle of the water.The faucet extenders are a great way to help eliminate struggling, whether you have a stepstool or not.  I think it has also helped reduce the amount of splashing water on the counter since the water is more in the middle of the sink now.A great inexpensive item that is really useful to have with little ones!I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

My daughter has very thick hair, which is prone to waves and frizz.  Plus, after a summer of sun and swimming, plus more swimming lessons, her hair needed some extra conditioning.This hair oil treatment is easy to use.  I usually put some in my palm and rub it on my hands and smooth it on her hair, usually when damp (then allow to air dry or partially blow-dry).This product has a light scent, but nothing overpowering, and it is very pleasant.  It helps make my daughter's hair look smooth and healthy, but not greasy or stringy. It looks healthy and is less prone to frizz.The Macadamia Hair Oil comes in a small plastic bottle.  Although I usually prefer glass, I like the plastic in this case, as I don't want to handle a glass bottle in the bathroom, when combined with an oil product!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We use a lot of fresh garlic, and had a garlic press for years, but the hinge gave out on it.  The KOVOT press & slicer looked nice and sturdy, modern - plus I've only ever had a garlic press (not slicer)!This garlic press is very easy to use.  There are two compartments inside: one for slicing and one for pressing.  A big clove of garlic easily fits inside without a problem.  Then squeeze the handles together (making sure the press is fitted together properly), and voila, you have your choice of pressed or sliced garlic!Since the garlic slicer is a new feature for me in a garlic press, I am having fun with it.  I love garlic so having little slices in my food is wonderful!Washing out the press/slicer is easy.  The inside of the slicer is labeled carefully (to note the sharp blades), and the inside of the handle has a little plastic tool that helps you remove any bits of garlic that get stuck in the press (as they always seem to for me).  Works like a charm!The press is comfortable in the hand and seems sturdy, so I'm glad to have found not only a replacement for my old garlic press but a big improvement with more features!I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We got this little LED touch-light for my daughter, for her locker, but this would be great in lots of dim areas, like under a cabinet, or in a closet.This light bar has four LED lights, and the light fixture rotates side to side so you can angle the light.It does not come with batteries, and it was easy to install the 3 AAA batteries.  You just slide off the back, and slide back into place when done (my 8 year old did this).The back has two large foam stickers for attaching to a surface, as well as some extras in the box.  You can also change the batteries without having to peel the stickers off the back - just slide the light part off the back panel.The light turns on and off with a set of two little metal spots on the light (capacitive touch sensors).  This makes it easy to turn it on and off, and my daughter really likes that feature.This is a hit in my daughter's locker, but I wouldn't mind having some of my own!The only thing I might change is having different light levels, but it doesn't really need it.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I have wanted a fabric shaver for a long time - it may sound funny, but I have had a lot of my sweaters for a long time, and I also consign a lot of clothes.  I have literally spent too much time trying to cut pills off clothing with scissors.  And when my husband sold his old car, we cut all the pills off the fabric with scissors.  Needless to say, this product was long overdue.This is a small, lightweight product, and I wasn't sure how well it would work.You simply plug it in and slide the switch at the thumb location to turn on the shaver.  Inside the device, sharp blades rotate underneath the little metal grill.I tried this on one of my favorite old hoodies, which is covered with pills (see photo - I'm not sure why the first photo is so washed out, but you can see the pills!).  Simply run the shaver over the pills, and you can hear the pills getting shaved off.  There is a clear panel where you can see the pills collecting.  The shaver does a fantastic job!  In no time it had the pills shaved off, leaving none behind.I also like that this plugs in - no need to waste batteries.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

Recently we have had skunks digging up our yard.  Despite treating for grubs, our yard is just torn up by the skunks.  I have kids (and I don't want to harm wildlife or our ecosystem), so I wanted something natural.  These little non-toxic pellets are a convenient way to keep the skunks and other critters away.This repellent is easy to use - I just flip open the cap and shake.  Half is for pouring, half has holes for shaking.  I ended up using the pouring side because I am covering such a large area.The pellets have a sort of natural smell, and not horribly offensive.  It does smell bad but not nauseating :)I will keep my review updated as far as how much success we have.  This seems to have kept the skunks away for the past week or two.** Update: I used this in an attempt to keep skunks from digging up the yard, and they came back and did more damage.  I thought I had some pretty good coverage.  Perhaps I needed more or it is more effective on other pests, but it did not keep they away.I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

My kids love puzzles, so they were excited when this arrived.My first impression is that this is much smaller than what I expected. This lamp came just in time for lots of use - between homework, reading, and other projects that need light.I have to say, I LOVE this lamp!One of the pretty cool features is that it is actually recharges!  It comes with a charging cable for USB, as well as an AC adapter you can plug the USB cable in to.* The only downside to this product is the AC adapter - the prongs are not straight at all.  They aren't wiggly either, so it isn't something that was bent or can be bent back into place.  We are not going to use the AC adapter, and instead we use our own USB charging station. *This lamp has 3 brightness settings, which is great, like if you want to read at night in bed, versus needing brighter light for other projects.  There are lots of LEDs in this lamp, but it has a nice surface over the lights to help diffuse the light.I love how adjustable this lamp is. The neck bends quite a bit, so you can have the light up high or down low.  The base is nice and sturdy so that I don't have to worry about the lamp tipping (which has been a concern with other LED lights, especially around my kids).The on/off/dimming switch is right on the base, and you simply tap the solid plastic to operate the lamp.  I love how sleek and attractive this lamp is.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

This diffuser is easy to assemble and use.Also I like that it is lightweight and small enough to pack in a suitcase for travel.It comes with a water container that makes refilling easy since you don’t have to unplug and refill.The lights make it a great nightlight. The colors are very relaxing and makes for a wonderfully de-stressing combination of lights and essential oils (like lavendar).Use without essential oils for a personal size humidifier. The only negative is that the water/refill part (and plug-in) does not fit inside the diffuser so it makes it a small piece that is easy to lose.  I would love to have it fit inside so I could pack it all into one small space.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I got this for my husband after he tried a beard oil that had a scent, and he wanted to find something unscented.  This is truly fragrance free (sometimes companies say fragrance free and the actual ingredients still have a scent to them).  So rest assure, he puts this on his beard, and doesn't have to deal with a scent all day long (especially being that he puts in on his facial hair right under his nose).This is made of all natural oils, and I like that it doesn't have a bunch of chemicals on it.  You could probably use this on your skin as well.  This beard oil helps to make his beard soft, smooth, shiny, and comfortable.Overall, this product is wonderful. Husband approved.

My kids and I both enjoy doing crafts, and washi tape can be lots of fun.Our Mudder Washi tape came as a set of 6 rolls: (3) "bubbles" and (3) spanish phrases.The tape is thin and almost papery, and can actually be torn with my fingers without having to be cut with scissors.It has a translucent quality to it, so you can see through it a little bit.The designs are fun, and my kids really like the bubbles.  My friend speaks fluent Spanish and confirmed that the Spanish phrases are all accurate (endearing phrases).This washi tape is fun to use for so many things.  I think we use it most often for things like cards and envelopes.  The possibilities really are endless for crafts.  My daughter has even wrapped her pencils in tape.  You could also use on things like gifts or anything else you might want to embellish.I received this set in exchange for my honest review.

We do a lot of camping and sleepovers, and this would make a nice sleeping bag for indoor sleepovers or warmer weather camping.  It says it is good down to 48F but I think I would be chilly as I tend to be on the colder side.  This is a great option for indoor sleepovers or when we go camping in the summer and I am always sweltering in my sleeping bag!This is a basic sleeping bag in a rectangular shape (does not have a mummy design where it comes up around your head).It zips all around the outer edge, and it can be connected to their version that has a zipper on the opposite side.  I might even like this for my daughter, since we pair off with the kids and my daughter always ends up wedged in the corner of the tent, freezing cold, out of her sleeping bag, so it would be nice if she could just cuddle with me!The bag comes with a nice compression sack.  It fits easily in the sack and then you can cinch the straps to make it even smaller.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

As a busy mom, food storage is important to me.  I try to keep on top of storing leftovers, and properly storing food so that it doesn't go bad.This is a nice set of food storage containers - for one, the 5 containers (with lids on) nest in one another for easy storage.Each container has a lid with a seal on the inside edge.  The lids fit tightly and there are snaps on all four sides of the lid to ensure that your food is locked tight.  I can't tell you how often my kids leave a bag of food open or not closed carefully, and we end up with chewy crackers, etc.  I like to transfer foods from their store packages into these storage containers.The containers are marked with care instructions, as they are both microwave and dishwasher safe (just make sure lids are at least askew if heated in the microwave).These wash easily and I haven't had any issues putting them in the dishwasher.The small size is great for things like lunchboxes and snack bags, and the largest size holds a big portion of food.  (To give an idea of size, I can lay a loaf of bread in this but not put the top on as it is too high).  The variety of sizes is convenient and we just used several containers after my daughter's family birthday party for everything from leftover pizza, to leftovers from our veggie tray and leftover dessert.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

My kids have finally reached an age where we can go out on hikes with them.  I used to do a lot of hiking, and hiking poles are great for stability among other things.  I actually like to have one on me in the event of an emergency, like having to defend myself against a dog or something.This pole is lightweight and comes in a small carry bag.  It breaks down into 3 pieces, but is connected by a cord that runs through the pole.  You slide the pieces together and lock them in place, which is easy to do.There is a nice wrist strap on the pole, and the handle has a nice soft material that is also contoured to your hand, so it makes it easy to grip the handle even when you are sweaty.You can remove the tip, and it comes with two rubber tips (one on and one off).  It also has a little basket at the end.The only downside is that the product doesn't come with any information.  I was thinking of getting one of these for the grandparents, and it would be nice if it had a little insert about how to use the locking mechanism on the side.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

Teething can be such a frustrating time for both baby and parents alike.  That was when I stopped wearing jewelry and started pulling my hair back since my baby would grab at anything she could!  I gave this set to my best friend, whose baby is entering the teething phase.  She and her baby both enjoy this set!The necklace is a nice length - nice and long so that your little one can really grab it and play with it.  It gives them a little length to work with and not be right up on your neck.  The back of the necklace has a safety clasp so that it will release if too much pressure is put on the necklace.  Nice to have a safety feature.The bracelet is a sturdy bangle, and my friend often ends up just taking this off and letting her little one enjoy it on his own.  This one has been particularly good for chewing on!The set is pretty to wear, and as a new mom, it is a nice alternative to regular jewelry that might be uncomfortable or unsafe for your little one.  I don't even think that people would guess this is silicone!This is such a nice set for yourself, or to give.  It is a perfect gift for a new mom and even a mom having her second (or third, etc) baby, especially when it is tough to find something nice for both mom and baby for someone who has had a baby before.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I have two girls, so the kids have taken over one bathroom and we fortunately have our own bathroom.  I find I can always use some good bath mats and bath rugs, and we put this DocBear Bathroom Rug right to use.This is much like our other memory foam bathroom rugs, although it is a little lighter weight. Because it has a lighter, thinner feel to it, I am taking off a star.The outer material is very soft and comfortable, pretty much the same as our several other memory foam rugs.This has a nice non-slip bottom. It has a good grip to it and it certainly isn't going anywhere (which is especially good for the kids).Stepping on the rug feels very nice and comfortable.  The size is on the small side, but you know what you are getting when you order the product and the measurements are listed.  This serves as a nice little mat right outside the bathtub or in front of the sink.  Stepping on cold tile is no fun, and stepping on tile with wet feet can mean trouble (slipping), so it is nice to have this instead.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

We try to eat healthy, and my daughter has a nut allergy.  Prior to having kids, I loved spending my time perusing the store for new products to try. Now, with two kids, I don't have the luxury.  I try to stick with what is on my list and get out of the store, so that doesn't lend well to finding new products.I chose the box of nut-free snacks, as our house is completely nut-free.  My daughter not only has an allergy, but we try to eat healthy, and she's picky, so I tend to have a lot of factors that make it difficult to shop for her!  This package came just at the right time, at the beginning of the school year, when I am trying to keep a variety of foods for snacks and lunches.My kids were super excited to try the box.  I wanted to make sure that my daughter with the nut allergy tried products she had not tried before.  The only thing I think we had tried prior to receiving the box were the BBQ Pop Chips, so it was nice to have a variety of products that were all pretty much new to all of us.  I also like that this has a variety of sweet vs savory, as there is a selection of chips, granola bars, and dried fruits.Our favorite item in the box are the granola bars, as my daughter has not been able to have any granola bars before because they are never peanut safe.  I also like that the box offers some items in different flavors, because I will repurchase items that were favorites.I think this box is such a great idea, and I'd love to try the non-GMO/organic versions next.  A great way to sample products, and its like having a personal shopper!I received a box in exchange for my honest review.

I love that this product comes in a nice, BPA-free, re-sealable, screw-top container for easy use and re-use.  (I have purchased shea butter before that came in a bag).This product has a nice, light scent. It is all natural and not fragranced, and I would describe it as natural and earthy.Melts in your hand for easy application OR can be scooped (and measured) with a spoon for use in recipes.  I love making my own body butters, which you mix this with some other natural ingredients.One note:  Shea butter is somewhat greasy feeling, but our skin NEEDS those moisturizers.  If you can rub it in and let it be for a few minutes, do so!  Otherwise, apply it after a shower and before bed to avoid getting fingerprint residue all over everything.  It is worth it!  I love putting this on my skin right before bed.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I love making healthy drinks and smoothies, so I got this product thinking that I would try it with my kids.Just a note - this is not nut-safe.  My 5 year old has a peanut allergy and she cannot have this.  The label actually says "Allergen Friendly" but then in tiny letters it says "Manufactured in a facility that processes nuts, tree nutes, peanuts, seeds, soy, wheat, and dairy (milk).  I feel like the listing for this product is misleading because you can see where the image shows "allergen friendly" but not the allergy warning.  Had I known that, I likely would not have ordered this product (as our household is entirely nut-free).I do give them lots of credit though, as this product has no sugar, no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives.I tried this with my 8 year old, and I have also tried it myself.  I use a heaping scoop in juice or water.  It does leave some particles behind that don't completely dissolve, but fortunately my daughter is open to trying things.  My younger daughter would take one look at the little bits and refuse to drink it, so everyone is different.  That being said, it doesn't seem grainy, even though it might look like it.It has a sweet taste, kind of fruity, but from years of taking things like spirulina, I can taste undertones of greens.  The sweetness is nice but you can tell it is an alternative sweetener (in this case, stevia).Waiting to see how well it works as far as curbing appetite.  My daughter does have a sweet tooth so it is a nice feature in a product.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

Teething can be such a terrible time for little ones - I remember my babies grabbing at my hair, clothes, toys, anything they could gnaw on.  I got this for my friend whose baby just started teething.  For one, the necklace is beautiful!  The colors are gorgeous, and the silicone beads are tied on a satin cord.  I would wear this even without a baby!The beads are nice squishy silicone that give baby something to bite on.  It is so nice to have something for your little one to grab and chew, not real jewelry that could get ruined or hurt your baby.  Baby "M" is thoroughly enjoying grabbing and chewing on the necklace :)The necklace is also easy to wash, with soap and water.  It is holding up well and I can see this being used for baby #2 :)I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I love using ginger for lots of things, and I love that it also has lots of great health benefits.  And as with products that have health benefits, I prefer that they are organic, so I fully appreciate that this is organic ginger.My ginger powder came sealed in a thick plastic pouch.  I have added this to my stash of products I add to my smoothies in the morning.  I make smoothies with coconut milk, greens, a banana, and frozen fruit - then adding in things with additional health benefits, and the Kazu organic ginger powder is an excellent addition.The powder is very finely ground - no clumps or graininess.  This doesn't seem to be as strong or spicy as some other ginger powders I have used, which is not an issue.  It tastes fantastic and I like the flavor that it adds to smoothies and so much more.  Great for lots of baking projects too.I received a sample of this product in exchange for my honest review.

We can never seem to have a shortage of flashlights, and a bright, reliable flashlight is a must for things like camping trips with the family.This little flashlight is small but powerful.  It feels solid in your hand and has some texture to it to help grip it, as well as a loop for your wrist.  I have always had a hard time lending a flashlight to the kids if I thought they were going to drop it!It is amazing how bright this flashlight is, and it is everything we need for something like a camping trip, from trips to the bathroom to cleaning up the campsite after dark.It comes with a charger which is great too.  You can purchase extra batteries and keep a stash of rechargeable batteries without worrying about having to go through lots of disposable batteries.I received this product in exchange for an honest review.  Overall a great flashlight.

My kids were excited as soon as this hair brush arrived - for one, it is super cute!  It is pink and purple, and the bristles are all different colors.  Plus, the "bristles" are squiggly looking pieces of plastic!This brush is much smaller than I expected.  But that is fine - perfect for little hands.  Also makes a cute stocking stuffer!The back of the brush has a cute mirror on it too, which is so convenient (why doesn't every brush have one?!).The brush works nicely to work out tangles.  The kids always complain when I brush their hair, and this helps make it easier, even if in part because it is cute or because it inspires them to want to brush their own hair.I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

I needed some tables for my new home, so I purchased these.  Here is my review.1) Color:  The color of the stain is espresso, there is no red in the color, but you can still see the grain of the wood quite well.  5 of 5 stars2) Construction:  It appears that there is no particle board, it is solid wood.  Some assembly is required.  It uses wood dowels and screws to mount the leg sides to the top.  There is no included wood glue.  4 of 5 stars3) Finish:  One of the three tables does have some minor issues with the finish, it appears it wasn't applied correctly and has left some clumps of the dried finish on one of the legs. Although its not noticible unless you run your hand down the leg of the table, its still something that should have been noticed at QC. Every other part of these are top notch quality. 3 of 5 stars4) Strength:  I used wood glue for the dowels and the included screws.  Once everything is put together and the glue has dried, these tables are amazingly strong. 5 of 5 stars.Also, there are no glides on these tables.  I purchased Safeglides 1" felt glides for that purpose.  Those are found on Amazon if you do a search for them.  I have laminate flooring and the glides will keep the tables from scratching the floors.

I've held off writing a review until I could test everything on this item.  Here is my review....1) Crock pot: Its not nearly as good as a dedicated standard crockpot.  The food simply doesnt come out as tender as a regular crock pot. 2 of 5 stars2) Pressure Cooker:  It actually works better as a crock pot than a pressure cooker.  And the crock pot function isnt that great.  2 of 5 stars.I will keep trying to make it work.  If not, I will sell it.

I've had this console for a few weeks now.  Here is my review.1) Construction:  The console main components are solid wood with the exception of parts of the drawers.  5 of 5 stars2) Ease of Assembly: Assembly was a little difficult for just one person. Further, I was disappointed in the fact that the dowels were sized differently than the dowel holes. The holes were larger.  Also, there was no wood glue for the dowels.  So, if you want to make the table as strong as possible, as a console for a flat TV, you need different dowels and wood glue. 2 of 5 stars.3) Look and feel:  The table looks really good.  The drawers are very functional and even have a drawer stop, which is unusual for Winsome and a welcome improvement over other items they ,manufacture. The color is true espresso, there is no red in the stain and it is dark. Yet not too dark where the grain of the wood is hidden.  In fact, the wood grain that shows through is really quite nice.  I would question the durability of the finish however.  I am already noticing some very minor scratches on the surface.  4 of 5 starsOver all, this is a good buy.  I highly recommend this console from Winsome.

These bamboo coasters are very nice and come with a holder.  I purchased them so that I could match the rolled bamboo placemats.  The coasters are excellent. They have a firm backing and are not flimsy.  They match the bamboo placemats perfectly.  Those mats are located at this link below:  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00JCVH2AO?psc=1&redirect=true&ref_=oh_aui_detailpage_o01_s00

I purchased these bamboo placemats to protect my new wood dining table.  Here is my review.1) Look and feel.  Wow, these really are nice looking.  They have a very dark outside edge that provides a nice contrast to the bamboo. 5 of 5 stars.2) Protection.  They come with a fabric back that allows them to be rolled.  So, with this design, the advantage is that they can be stored in a roll so they take up less space.  To me, this design is irrelevant.  The bamboo surface and the fabric back provide protection for the wood table from dinnerware. 5 of 5 stars.I am very happy with the purchase.  I also purchased the bamboo coasters which match!  Here is the link:  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B002QP6NBW?psc=1&redirect=true&ref_=oh_aui_detailpage_o01_s00

I used this in combination with a bed frame and a memory foam mattress.  Here is my review...1) Strength.  I weigh about 280 lbs and I didnt have any problem with the strength of this box.  Further, there are no squeaks either.  5 of 5 stars.2) Instructions.  The instructions are fine, but you probably wont need them, its pretty basic to put together. I put it together myself, but it would be easier for two people.  5 of 5 stars.3) Scent.  There is no scent or smell coming from the fabric covering or the wood that makes up its construction.  5 of 5 starsOverall, I had no problems with this purchase.  In fact, there were extra hardware included to make sure you have enough.

9/6/2015 UPDATEAfter 36 days, this light stopped working.  I tried to return it, but its six days too late.  I DO NOT RECOMMEND this light.  I changed my recommendation from 4 stars to 1.---------------------------------I purchased this so I could provide some additional night time security for my car.  Here is my review ....1) Size:  The light is a bit smaller than I imagined, allowing it to fit almost anywhere.  5 of 5 stars2) Brightness:  I use the setting where at night, the light is in dim mode unless someone crosses in front of it, then it gets really bright.  I'm surprised how bright it is.  I've never seen this from a solar light before.  5 of 5 stars.3) In the dim mode, is produces enough light so that I can find where I am walking. 5 of 5 stars4) Quality look and feel:  Everything about this light is quality.  5 of 5 stars.

Today I got the Dunghill Transitional Style Espresso finish bedframe.  Here is my review.1) Wood?  Yes, everything that I can tell is made of real wood.  5 of 5 stars2) Instructions?  No, there were no instructions on how to put it together. 0 of 5 stars3) Color? The advertised color is espresso, which is a dark brown.  The color I got is black.  0 of 5 stars4) Merchant and customer service:  My merchant was Furniture of America.  You must understand that they farm out freight to several companies.  Mine arrived in a white unmarked van.  Customer service was poor from the beginning.  0 of 5 starsI do not recommend this purchase.

I purchased this item about a month ago and have used it a lot.  Here is my review.1. Size:  Being single, I don't like to have a lot of pots and pans taking up space in the apartment. At the same time, I want something I can make stew, soup or just boil up some veggies with. This is the perfect size if you are looking for one pot.  5 of 5 stars.2. Lid: The lid features a heat insulated handle and is made of glass so you can see your food cooking.  Further, it features two strainers to allow the water to escape while your food remains. Clever!  5 of 5 stars3. Outer Finish:  The gold finish is painted on and is high quality.  Oil does not stain it.  The bottom of the pan is anodized, which can stain.  The anodized surface makes the heat transition to the pot very quickly compared to other, non-anodized pots.  5 of 5 stars.4. Inner Finish:  It is made of a non-stick surface.  It is quite good actually, and probably the best non-stick surface I have ever cooked on.  5 of 5 stars.5. Insulating Handle:  The handle is insulated with a silicone type of surface.  It doesn’t extend down to the handle enough, so once in a while you'll get burned if you are not careful.  3 of 5 stars.I recommend this pot.

I purchased this about 3 weeks ago simply for a round scrubber.  I was surprised - here is my review.1) Stainless Steel.  It looks awesome with stainless steel and a black top.  5 of 5 stars2) Liquid Soap.  In what world as the liquid soap dispenser in these ever work?  Welcome to the new world!  This one works like a charm.  you simply stop scrubbing the pan, lift the scrubber in the air, use your index finger to push on the black flexible top and a dab of soap drops down on your pan.  FREAKY GOOD!  10 of 5 stars.3) Brushes.  They are nice, not so stiff, but enough to scrub off your dishes. 5 of 5 starsI really didn't expect the soap dispenser to work, I purchased this as a brush with stainless steel.  I got a bonus!

I actually purchased this to see if I would like it as a night stand for a lamp on both sides of my bed.  Here is my review.1) Finish.  So, the finish was sprayed on after it was put together.  The problem with that is that you can miss some spots, but nothing too obvious.  4 of 5 stars.2) Fit.  When putting it together it really didn't fit that well.  But once everything is tightened (not over-tightened) its ok, and sits flat on the floor and doesn't wobble around.  4 of 5 stars.3) Function.  This is a pretty basic table, it just has to sit flat, have a two surfaces to put things.  5 of 5 stars.4) This was purchased and shipped from Amazon and I chose one day shipping.  It arrived a day late.  1 of 5 stars.  I did get a credit for the extra shipping I paid.  I docked four stars from this because I really feel that Amazon of all companies, should really have this worked out by now.  Afterall, they probably ship more than anybody else in the world.

I've owned this now for about 3 weeks and wanted to give myself sufficient time to write a good review from sleeping on the mattress.  Here is my review.1) Packaging.  I must  say I was impressed with the cleverness of the packaging.  I mean, who sends a mattress through the mail?  But, since it is foam, the mattress arrives compressed and rolled up.  I simply opened the box, unrolled it and removed the plastic and the foam took about 24 hours to expand into place.  5 of 5 stars.2) Comfort.  This is probably the real reason why anybody gets a new mattress.  Its good!  Its Comfortable very supportive.  Im over 50 years old, and I have problems with both shoulders.  When I lay on my side, the pain wakes me up and I miss a lot of sleep.  I must say I have no more pain in my shoulders because the mattress is supportive all over, not just pinning the support on my shoulder.  Thus, I get much more sleep.  Further, I can also sleep on my stomach, which is nice to have another position to sleep. If I could give it 10 stars for comfort I would!  5 of 5 stars.3) Look and feel.  The fabric covering is nice and quality.  5 of 5 stars.4) Formaldehyde.  When you open the plastic bag to let the mattress expand, there is a pretty strong scent of formaldehyde.  I kept the mattress in the living room and opened the windows at night.  After 2 days of venting, I put it in the bedroom.  While sleeping on it, once in a while I do smell the formaldehyde.  But to be honest, the mattress is so comfortable, that its a secondary concern.  4 of 5 stars.Thank you Signature Sleep for producing this mattress at an affordable price.

The price is right as long as your expectations are low.  Here is my review.1) Filler / Batting.  Very very thin, not at all like the photo.  0 of 5 stars.2) Color.  Take about two shades lighter than the photo.  Its not dark in color at all. The burgundy is really not burgundy, almost hot pink, but some sort of faded wierd color that goes with nothing.  0 of 5 stars3) Quality of sewing.  Whoever sewed this together, put a 4 inch center sewing line at the end of the comforter.  2 of 5 stars.4) Overall quality.  3 of 5 stars.I wish you luck if you make this purchase

Nike socks are simply the best socks out there.  There are no issues with quality or fit.  I love them, I use them for work because they are good. I highly recommend them.1) Fit.  I have a size 11 foot and they fit perfectly.  They also stay up on my let without fitting loose or falling down.2) Long Life.  I have used Nike socks in the past and they last longer than any other brand I have used.3) Quality.  There are no loose threads, no fabric runs and no other quality issues.

I purchased these because I needed a way to store my packet seasonings (Chili Seasonings) and food (packet instant potatoes).  Here is my review.1) Look and feel.  It is very high quality plastic with no sharp edges and is very sturdy.  The separating bar in the middle is not adjustable, but thats not a problem for me.  5 of 5 stars.2) Size.  It fits the standards chili, taco and gravy seasoning packets with room to spare.  The Idahoan potato packets fit, but you have to scrunch them just a tad, which is fine with me. 5 of 5 starsThis is a great way to save space in a cabinet or lazy susan.

I did a lot of research on a coffee press and settled on this one by Bruntmor.  I should say that I use Coffee Presses for ground cocoa beans. Here is my review.1) Look and Feel.  All I can say is WOW!  Its polished stainless steel on the outside, brushed stainless steel on the inside.  There are no seams in the metal that I can find.  It looks very high quality. 5 of 5 stars.2) Function.  What I really like about the stainless instead of glass is the uniformity of the interior.  With glass, sometimes its not even, allowing grounds to escape.  Not so with this unit.  Everything works better than expected.  5 of 5 starsI highly recommend this Coffee Press!

Unfortunately this toaster has received some poor reviews and I thought I would buy this from a local store and write a review here on how I thought this toaster performs.1)  Cord Issues.  There are several reviews that say the cord comes out the front.  Well, thats not entirely accurate because the toaster feartures a cord wrap around structure on the bottom.  So, you wrap it half way around and it comes out the back.  Easy.  5 of 5 stars2) Crumb Tray.  The tray is designed to open by sliding it forward, and then pushing it closed.  Once a person understands that, it works just fine with no issues and does not open on its own.  5 of 5 stars.3) Toasting.  There are no issues at all, works just like it should.  In fact, it toasts very evenly, much more even than my last $100 toaster. 5 of 5 stars.4) Not Heavy.  This toaster  feels very light.  I suppose that's how they lowered the cost of shipping them from China to the USA.  I don't have a problem with that. 5 of 5 stars.5) Looks.  Its awesome looking!  5 of 5 stars6) Controls.  The toaster has a cancel button which stops it from toasting and pops up the toast.  You can't use the handle for this.  I suppose the reason is because the toaster is so light, you would flip it around if you weren't careful.  I like the button.  5 of 5 stars

These stainless steel measuring cups and spoons works just fine and are what I expected.  The cups have an integrated pouring spout is is a nice bonus when heating something, like butter, on a stove and then pouring it.  5 stars!
This ink works really good with no issues of compatibility or quality.  I would highly recommend!

I read the reviews before I purchased this cooktop and was fairly prepared for what to expect.  Here is my review ....1.  Infrared Element.  I've had infrared elements in ranges before so I was expecting this unit to be fast at heating, but I was disappointed.  The unit is actually pretty slow at heating up.  Granted, I have never owned a single element cooktop that runs off of 110vac.  But, contrary to other posts, its not fast by any stretch of the imagination. 4 of 5 stars2. Electronic Smell and vapor.  This was a bit alarming, but not totally unexpected from reading the other reviews.  During the first few days of use, the cooktop produces a vapor emanating out of the bottom of the unit combined with an electronic smell.  So far no fires, in fact, the unit has stopped producing those effects after a few days.  3 of 5 stars.3. Style.  I like the handles on the side and the stainless steel look.  5 of 5 stars.4. Temp Control.  Like most infrared cook tops, it is thermostatically controlled.  To fry something, you'll have to crank it all the way up to high.  After a few minutes, the round control knobs does get quite hot, but no fires yet!  The control does give a nice range and the control light when lit, indicates when the unit is on.  4 of 5 starsI admit, I am a little uncomfortable with the heat coming off the control knob.  I keep it unplugged when not in use. This cook top is not UL rated.
I love this fragrance and always get compliments from it.  Most of the guys want to know where I got it, and how much it was.  This is a very good deal for this fragrance.

I love this flashlight!  I highly recommend it for the car or a safety kit.  The laser is powerful enough to point things out at night, but not during the day.  The flashlight in normal mode is not as bright as some, but it works for the purpose I use it for as a flashlight for the car.  Its very durable, as I have had it now for several months with no issues at all.  This would not be good for lighting up something at a distance,  But works well for something up close. If you use it as I have, you will enjoy this light.

This is my review of the LUCID 2 Inch Foam Mattress Topper.1) Its NOT memory foam.  Its just foam.2) It IS 2 inches thick3) It IS Insulating4) True memory foam would be better in almost every circumstance.I used this on top of an air mattress, which made it tolerable for me.  I don't think there would be any other benefits on top of a normal mattress.  If you are looking for  better comfort, besides being an insulator, I would find something that is true memory foam.

The reason I purchased these was to replace the Halogen light bulbs which were too hot, and used way to much energy.  These replacments are awesome, they are cool, and use very little energy and are actually quite bright.  This was an excellent purchase for me and I highly recommend them to others for the same reason I purchased them.

I think the most helpful thing to say about interstellar,  is that it's probably a bit too jammed with too many themes.  Its like watching 4 different movies with the same actors. Its almost as if the writer had A.D.H.D,  got through part of the movie and.... squirrel!

Movie Review: All is Lost.  I admit, when I was watching this I could almost hear Tom Hanks (star of the movie Cast Away) telling us the movie was a lot like his.  Well, with the exception that All is Lost stars Robert Redford but apparently Wilson decided he'd had enough of survival movies, because Robert has no co-star.  In a way, I suppose its a lot like the movie Gravity too.  Its about survival until the very last option is used up.  Until then, we use our brain and imagination to figure things out.  The setting of this movie is on a modern private sailing boat with the character played by Robert Redford who is alone, making all the tough decisions with out a think tank handy. Of course there are storms, radios that don't work, and survival tools that we all hope will get him through.  If you are bored, and wonder how you could handle it, watch it.  Its not as good at Cast Away or Gravity.  But hey, if you can survive the 2 hours of anxiety, maybe you can survive anything!
I dont drink coffee, so when a friend introduced me to this, I was a bit curious.  I love it, its awesome and I'm sure this will become trendy.  Im glad I got in on the ground floor!

I thought, from the reviews, that this was a good alternative to the brand name ink tanks, they are not.  Some of them work, and some of them don't.  The ones that don't, get an error message even though the tank is full.  Because two of the 5 tanks didnt work, its definitely not a good deal.
I put this on my exercise bike.  It works really good.  Durable, and it fits almost any size drink cup.

I've been looking for an alternative aerobic exercise  rather than simply walking when there is inclement weather.  I settled on this item and here is my review....1) Sturdiness:  Its beefy! The review has been updated 30 days after my purchase.  The cut outs for the charger cord are not big enough.  The plug for the charger tweeks the case causing it to eventually break. Re-rated from 5 to 1 star.----------------- original review -------------------------If you want an open face case protector, this one is hot!1) Cutouts:  All are good, and the headphone cutout is especially large! 5 of 5 stars2) Protection: The black part is almost a firm rubber and the colored ring is plastic. It has two layers of protection on the edge. Further, the edge is raised to help protect the face of the phone as well. 5 of 5 stars.3) Fit: The fit is nothing short of perfect. 5 of 5 stars.4) Look and feel: Wow, its really nice! 5 of 5 stars
