Also, there is a subwoofer in the middle that pours out the bass. Now I see how this small unit produces rich full sound.If you are looking for great a speaker, this one will impress any audiophile. This dual port USB charger is made for power users in the car, allowing you to charge two power hungry devices at the same time.Having two ports makes for a great charger, but packing two Qualcomm Quick Charge ports makes it even better.The Qualcomm Quick Charge 2.0 will give new Samsung Galaxy phones the ability to charge a up to 75% faster.  Also, they will charge any mobile device just at slower speeds.Many newer phones come with this technology which chargers phone up to 75% faster. This wireless charger is a great way to charge you phone minus the cord.I do not know about you, but I hate searching for a cord to charge my phone. Having this wireless charger makes charging much easier. This charging method will take more time than a standard wall charger. Most people charge their phones at night time, so this is not a deal breaker.First, you have to make sure your phone is Qi-Compliant (wireless charging capable). There are there options to choose from: your phone comes with wireless installed; you change your back cover to a wireless cover; or get a wireless patch that goes between the back cover and battery. Once you have chosen you wireless charging method, plug up the wireless charger and let the magic happen.Once you phone is placed on the charging pad, try to keep it centered on top of the charger. There is a status LED that will show the charge state, white for standby and a blinking blue for charging. Also, for best results remove the phone from case or it may make it harder to charge.The best part is the raised silicone pad that keeps your phone from moving while charging.I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

It works as described, but better as a toy.The layout is a miniature version of the Thor hammer as seen on TV. The body is made of all metal with a chrome finish. Also, there is a chain attached that make it easy to place on a keychain.The usb flash drive in on the backside of the hammer. With the push of a button it slides out and is ready for use. This will fit into some usb ports.Due to the size and weight it makes it not practical for use as a normal flash drive. This is not to say that it does not work, but just on the large and awkward side.On a good note I took the entire hammer apart and found out the size of the actual usb drive is smaller than a piece of Dentyne chewing gum. I keep my important data on here and keep it tucked inside my wallet.I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

This is an easy way to charge you 18650 batteries.The design is simple, yet very effective. All you have to do I put the batteries into the charger, when they are charged the light will turn from red to greet.This is a perfect charger for flashlights or other devices that require this type of lager batteries. This little light will shed a ton of light.When I received this flashlight, I assumed it would be just another flashlight. After putting the batteries in and turning it on, I was blown away.To power the light, you can either use three AAA or one 18650. This light is small but big on lumens, 600 to be exact. This is bright enough turn night into day.In the hand it has a nice solid feel and weight, about the size of a bicycle handlebar grip. Unlike others on the market, there is no zoom dial ring to turn. All you have to do is press the power button at the rear.This light is also water resistant , there is a rubber O-Rings at the battery screwed cap. This is great for camping or fixing a leaking kitchen sink.Be warned, "The Light Is Very Bright". Please do not make the same mistake I did and look into the light, you will see stars. There are five light modes: High (Too Bright), Medium (Super Bright), Low (Regular Flashlight), Strobe, and SOS. On the brightest setting, you can anything in the basement without turn on the lights.The best feature is the supplied rechargeable 18650 battery and battery charger.I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

This is a great way to remove those very noticeable scratches.If you are like me and live in an older house with all hardwood floors you will be have some accidents. Many of these scratches will come from normal wear and tear.After having a Labrador Retriever as family pet we noticed fine white scratches started to pop up throughout the house. When it was treat time he would get excited and dig his nails into the wooden floor to get his tasty treat.After cleaning and waxing the scratches would disappear for a week or so and magically reappear. Since receiving this scratch concealer I will able to break this cycle.Be sure to shake up the concealer before using to ensure everything is mixed up, much like you do with paint. Put a small bead on top of the scratch and rub it with the supplied cloth until the dry. Then open the curtains to allow it to cure in the sunlight, if no window is close by just use a lamp. For best results I used a damp rag to clean the scratch then allow to air dry.Granted this works as advertised to remove the white haze of a scratch and make it unnoticeable, but it will not make a scratch disappear. This magic concealer will fill in the void of the scratch and make it less visible to the naked eye. You would almost have to put your nose to the floor to see it.I received a sample for the purpose of review.

This little pill will increase mental clarity to push out those long demanding days.I work a twelve hour swing shift that becomes mentally demanding and challenging. The body is a hard rubber plastic mix which is very sleek, and just big enough to cover the phone. The case fits the phone nice and tight. Some say it is hard to remove the phone from the case, I see this as the case safely protecting the phone. To remove the phone simply pull from the back and front camera at the same time, it will easily slide out.The best part is the top cover that keeps the phone inside the case. Unlike most cases that just snap together and comes apart when dropped. The top cover has two hinged clips that hold it firmly together even is dropped.Since this case has a micro USB charging port, so this might not go over well for some, but not a deal breaker for me. There are four LED lights on the back that represent twenty five percent of battery life each. In order to use the battery, you must press and hold down the power button. Your phone will charge as it normally would as if it were plugged into a wall charger.I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

Now you can quickly add Bluetooth support to your car.I know this device is advertised as a "Bluetooth Car Kit", but it does even more. The best part is being able to use the car stereo as a Bluetooth speaker.Setup of the device is very simple and almost effortless. First find a place to attach the base with the supplied adhesive pad. Then insert the auxiliary cord into the radio input port. Lastly supply power with the cigarette adapter, since it has two ports you will have one left over to charge you phone.After paring with your phone, which is effortless. After the device is powered on it goes into pairing mode, this saves you from having to press any buttons.Receiving calls come across crystal clear. I was impressed by the capability of such a small device. My favorite function is streaming my music from my phone without having to hook up any cords.I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

This car charger is perfect for Apple products with the Lightning connection.Having a charger specifically made for your mobile device is perfect. In the hand, the charger is very small and light. The design is very simple. There is a sublet blue LED light when plugged in.Since the charging cable is not attached to the charger, that means you can take it with you when you leave the car. Also, the cable is flat which resists twisting.I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

Dynamic characters and well written.  A must read for people that love a great true story about someone trying to speak out about something wrong and it turning their world upside down.  The story focuses around baseball politics but digs down into corruption and special interest and deals with a family trying to stay together.  Really opened my eyes to a lot of issues I never knew existed.  Great for people like me that don't know anything about baseball since its a human story that happens to be about baseball.  Wonderful story well worth a read.  Highly recommended.

I recommend this summary guide.  There are a lot of great ideas and tips in this guide all presented without the fluff.  It gets right down to the point and makes it a fast read.  You get a summary of the text highlighting the main ideas as well as an analysis of the text.  I got more out of the summary then the original.  Very empowering for us ladies and is a must read.  Highly recommended!

My friends are always talking about this book (Sapiens) so I figured I would check it out.  I love it!  Glad I got this great summary guide to go with it.  It is so much easier to read through this companion.  You get the important facts fast.  The summary takes it a step further and goes over an analysis of the information presented.  You get an in-depth look at the people mentioned throughout the book as well.  It's a fast read full of useful information without all the fluff in the original.  Would highly recommend.

I have been looking into this line of work for a few weeks.  I bought about a dozen books and read as much as I could.  I must say this is by far the most complete book on the subject.  It covers everything you need to know including tax time.  Perfect for those serious about this business.  Very informative and I would highly recommend!

Loved the first one with the adventures of Ronan and Targle I had to get the 2nd book.  Just as good if not better then the first.  I had a blast reading this series and loved every minute of it.  Great for fans of Minecraft for all ages.  If you are a fan or know someone that is pick this series up for sure.  Great in game illustrations to go along with the story.  Highly recommended!

One of the best romantic thrillers I have read in a long time. Every page was a thrill ride filled with suspense and twists and turns. Highly recommended to any fan of suspenseful romance!  One of those must reads.  If it's not on your list add it for sure.  Whispy is a very dynamic character and fun to read about.  I love her!  The writing is top notch with just the right amount of tension to keep the reader glued to the pages.

Very informative.  This book covers everything from the subtypes to causes to help you identify your type of OCD.  The therapy section was the most useful for me.  It went over several avenues of treatment and things I could start trying at home before first.  From psychotherapy techniques to cognitive therapy I learned a lot.  Great advice on support groups and everything in-between.  I would highly recommend this to anyone suffering from OCD or knows someone that is.

I loved the original so much I picked up this companion to enhance my reading experience.  I love the characters Nicolas Fox and Kate O’Hare so much!  The book breaks down the chapters with some added insight.  I picked up on several things I had missed.  Their is a section that looks at the symbols and themes found throughout the book that really added some new ideas and angles I hadn't seen.  Well worth a read for fans of The Scam by Janet Evanovich and Lee Goldberg.  Perfect for book clubs for quick references and ideas on discussion questions.  Highly recommended!

This is a clear winner for me.  The first one was unique and a ton of fun.  Grabbed the 2nd in the series and it was even better.  Filled with adventure, mystery and a solid story line.  The illustrations were spot on and the story never lost it's pace.  Perfect for those that love Minecraft or want to get their kids reading.  I enjoy the stories as much as my kids!.  Pick up the whole series.  Highly recommended!

Loved the first one so much I was thrilled to find part 2.  Bought this up immediately.  Once again a fun and action packed story line with plenty of pictures to go along with the story.  If you are a fan of Minecraft pick up this full series.  If you have kids that don't like to read but are into Minecraft get them this.  It will get them reading for sure.  Highly recommended!

Must read for introverts and extroverts a like.  Huge fan of this book and this summary guide gives you all the highlights and main ideas with out having to read through the long stories in the original.  The summary sticks to the important facts and gives a complete overview of the chapter.  Saves you a ton of time.  I would highly recommend.

One of my favorite books.  Bought this companion to go along with it.  Glad I did.  This summary guide added a lot to the experience.  If you are a fan of David Lagercrantz's The Girl in the Spider's Web then pick up a copy.  It gives you a summary of the story with added insight as well as a look at the symbols and themes throughout the book.  Loved every page.  Would highly recommend for book lovers and for book clubs.

I love this series and picked up this companion to go along with the book.  It provided an in-depth look at the characters, the story and a look at the major themes and symbols throughout the story.  I picked up on a number of things I missed in the original story.  This would be perfect for book clubs that need a reference or something for great discussion questions.I loved the analytical comments found throughout the summary.  It added some new insight and ideas I hadn't thought of.  Highly recommended for any fan of Nature of the Beast.

Instant classic.  One of the best Minecraft stories out there and a unique story too.  Its like a new world within the Minecraft world.  All the mobs are at peace.  The Biome is an area separate from the humans.  The setup makes for some unique and fun story lines.  Looking forward to more from this series for sure.  I love the idea of the strange keys found through out the area.  I had a blast reading this and highly recommend to any Minecraft fan.

Really fun book from the view point of the zombie kids.  Typical family (kind of).  It was a lot of fun and we had a blast reading it.  I would recommend to any fan of Minecraft.  The "in game" pictures fit the story perfectly.  The Borgs are a lot of fun and looking forward to more from this series. Lets hope Steve finds some more diaries!  The story moves fast and will hold your interest.  Great book.  Highly recommended.

Great story!  Lobo must find his pack after the avalanche separated him.  I loved the "in game" pics they fit the story perfectly.  Plenty of Minecraft fun and characters along the way.  If you are a fan of Minecraft this is a great book to get.  My son loves it and so do I.  Every page has something going on and plenty of action to keep your interest.  Highly recommended for any fan of Minecraft.

Bought Keens for years for my two rough boys each summer the only shoes that last.  This year both had their straps fall apart.  Not worth the price.I see others complaining about this too.  If you can find them through the sea of fake reviews.  Wont be getting Keens again.

One of my favorite books.  I just loved how the story starts (with the death) and slowly explains how it came about as you read.  Any time I love a book or have a book club book I grab a summary guide.  They help me get more out of the book and pick up on things I may have missed.  Great look into the symbols found throughout the book.  No spoilers but this should come packaged with the original.  The chapter summary helped me notice things I didn't before.  Fantastic story and a fantastic summary guide to Everything I Never Told You.  Highly recommended!

An amazing list.  Great way to catch up on all the books you missed.  Out of the 25 New York Times Best Sellers I missed 18 which is a lot.  The other 7 contained a bunch of stuff I had missed or that really added to the story.This is a great deal for those looking to get up to date quickly or to get a feel for the book before you buy it.  These are quick and complete summaries but it will still last you a long time since there are so many.  Great value for the money and would recommend.You get a summary of the chapters with added insight as well as a look at major themes, symbols and plot.  The character section offered a great break down for easy reference.  I have a friend that is starting her own book club and this would be a great start to use for discussion questions and reference.  Recommended!

Very well done and detailed guide.  After reading this great summary for The Devil in the White City I found that I missed a number of things.  I used it in my book club for reference and discussion questions.  I wasn't a huge fan of the original book. I thought Instareads did a better job of telling the story actually. This definitely helped me bring my A game to the book club since I was able to get more out of the book then I originally did.  Great for people wanting to read the book quickly or for book club needs.  I loved the section on symbols and themes.  It made the book much more meaningful. If your a fan of the original this will help you get more out of it for sure.  Highly recommended.

Well written.  The story flows so fast and I had a blast reading it.  Ivy is an awesome character and you can feel her struggle and tension throughout the story. The story has some nice twists and turns that kept my interested throughout.  If you are into strong and interesting characters and a thriller/mystery type story-line this is a must read.  I loved the premise of Ivy being an investigator in a paranormal world where she can tell who is paranormal and who isn't.  There are some great sexual scenes that aren't over the top and are just right for my tastes.  The first book of what clearly will be a fantastic series.  I see the author also has another series starting and will be checking that out for sure.  Highly recommended.

I love old fashioned stories and this is the best adventure romance book I have ever read.  Set in colonial Africa.  After reading the original I wanted more and bought this summary guide.  An in-depth review and summary of the story and a detailed look at symbols and themes I had missed.  I consider this a must read for all fans of Circling the Sun.  Wonderful book that will enhance your experience and improve appreciation and understanding.  It came in handy at our book club for discussion questions and more in-depth look at the story.  Highly recommended!

Top notch summary guide to The Bourbon Kings.  If you loved the original book and are looking for more this is a must read.  Great overview of the characters, plot, and chapters.  Fantastic section on symbols and themes found throughout the book.  Perfect for anyone looking to get the most out of the book quickly, needs a little more after reading the original or for book clubs.  I found myself a little confused over some of the relationships in the book.  There are so many and I found this book helped clarify a lot of questions I had.  Provides a quick reference for book clubs as well as great discussion questions. Loved it and highly recommended.

I loved the character Elizabeth. The typical shy girl.  She gave off a great vibe and the author did a wonderful job in making her relatable to the reader.  I love stories about seeking love in places like NYC and love the theme of London in this book.  Always wanted to run off to London!  Theo was a strong character, arrogant and aggressive.  A stereotypical "plays by his own rules" American type.  Really looking forward to the rest of the series.  If you love great romance this is a sure pick.  Loved every page and would highly recommend.

The Oregon Trail story comes up through life from time to time, but if your like me you don't really know all that much about it.  Maybe it was the old video game, or some mention in a history book, or some obscure reference in something else.  Always wanting to learn more I heard of this great book by Rinker Buck.  A history buff that decided to drive a wagon over the entire Oregon trail from Missouri to Oregon over a summer in modern times.This summary guide provided not only a summary of the story but a companion to some of the events that occurred and going over plenty of things that I had missed in the original story.  A really fun and interesting adventure I highly recommend this summary guide.

Very comprehensive summary guide to Between the World and Me.  Easy to read and well laid out covering everything you need to know and more.  It gave insight into several things I missed and the symbols and themes section was awesome.  I read the original book as well and sometimes the writing got a bit slow and I was confused between Coates's internal conflict and the meaning.  Great book and I highly recommend it, but you need a companion book like this.There were a few things in the original book I didn't really agree with.  Most people would have different opinions and I liked how Instaread approached everything neutrally leaving it up to the reader to decide.  Highly recommended!

I consider this a must read for all parents.  I read the original but needed a refresher and something to reference from time to time.  This was perfect.  It covers all the big ideas, allowing you quickly absorb key concepts and then apply them.I really liked how the book went over the important people in the book giving more insight into them.  If you want to help your child grow, build character and learn valuable lessons that will carry with them into adult hood this is a must read.  A top notch summary guide to How Children Succeed should be in every parents Kindle.  Highly recommended!

I loved Harper Lee's new book Go Set a Watchman.  Wanting a little more from the book I got a few companions to go with it.  I must say this one is by far the best and most complete.  Perfect for my up coming book club.  This summary guide gives a list and description of all the characters as well as a look at the plot and setting.  The chapter summaries are great and I picked up on a number of things I had missed.  I absolutely loved the look at symbols and themes.  It added so much to the original text.If you grew up reading To Kill a Mockingbird then this is a must read.  Perfect for those that don't have a lot of time to read but want to understand and grasp the entire story quickly.  Also wonderful for people looking to get more out of the original text or for use in book clubs.  Must read and loved it!

One of the best books I have ever read and I wanted more when I finished it.  This book companion fit perfectly and gave me a break down of the characters and chapters as well as an in-depth look at the symbols and themes.  I found I missed so much in the original book.  This really helped me get more out of it and discover more.Perfect for book clubs that are looking for discussion questions or to use as a quick reference.  Also perfect for readers looking to get unanswered questions answered.  If your looking for more depth this is the book for you.  Highly recommended!

Awesome idea and a fun read.  Must have for movie fans or for those writing about or studying villains.  The "Did you know" section for each villain often had some really interesting little piece of information.  I also liked the "True villain moment."For those monster and bad guy lovers this is a great book to add to your collection.  Made me want to watch a few more movies and gave me some great ideas for bad guys in my books.

Really great way to find your purpose and strengths.  I think it should be mandatory for everyone to check this out.  Especially people looking for a career switch or just getting out of high school or college.  Life changing way to look at who you are and what you enjoy and do well.  This is a really well done program and the summary guide is perfect for those looking to pick up on the main ideas quickly and get the most out of it right away.  I would highly recommend this.

From time to time I go back and read some of the best books on Toltec wisdom.  I like The Four Agreements the best.  This summary guide is a great way to refresh quickly.  It would also be great for someone new to the concepts.  The book is well written and does an amazing job sticking to the main points.  Making them easy to understand and apply.Don Miguel Ruiz got most of his wisdom from Carlos Castaneda but I really love how Don Miguel puts it all together.  Fantastic book that everyone looking to improve their lives should read.  Highly recommended!

A summary of 25 NYT bestsellers.  Perfect for those trying to catch up on a ton of great work or to learn more about the original books before you buy them.  All the top books are in here and I found them well formatted and structured for easy reading.So many great non-fiction books! Even ones I had no interest in before I found were great and bought the originals.  I would have missed out!  I highly recommend this great value.  You can't go wrong with 25 of the best selling books on the NYT list.  The Power of Habit, Money Master the Game, Zero to One and It Starts with Food are well worth the price of admission alone.  Highly recommended!

This is a great guide to the original work by Ann Coulter.  It's a summary guide that takes all the top ideas and concepts and puts them in a easy to read format without all the filler.  This book is all about Ann's conservative views.  Perfect for people looking to use the book as a reference or for people that aren't fans of Ann that are trying to understand what she is saying.The summary does a wonderful job of dissecting her main arguments and makes them much easier to understand.  Fantastic!  Highly recommended and a must read for both fans and haters of Ann Coulter's Adios America.

A fantastic guide to All Single Ladies.  If you loved the original this has a lot to offer in terms of picking up things you may have missed and major themes and symbols in the story.  The chapter summary and the character review is great for book clubs, as a reference and a great way to get discussion questions.If you are a fan on All the Single Ladies this summary guide is a must have.  Well written, short and on point.  It's formatted to be skimmed quickly, picking up what interests you and getting the full story, setting and plot quickly.  Well worth a read for fans.  Highly recommended!

One of those rare awesome books that is epic in scale.  Environmental waste and several conflicting organizations come into play.  The plot has several layers that interweave through out the story.  Right from that start the reader is in put in the middle of the action.  An organized chanting protest that lays the foundation and setting for the story.Well paced and well written.  A great book for those looking for a deep story.  Well worth your time and I highly recommend it.

Loved the original and this summary guide.  If you are looking to get more out of the book such as a look at symbols and themes this is a great addition.  For those looking for a summary of the chapters and characters this guide also provides that.  Well written and easy to read through quickly allowing you to grasp all the key concepts.  Perfect for book clubs if you need a quick reference and discussion questions.  Highly recommend!

Our group got a copy of the original, although good it was lengthy and filled with fluff in my opinion.  I picked up this summary guide and it breaks down the important parts quickly.  Books I love I use as a reference and go back to several times.  This guide helps me do just that.  The book is packed with gems and great ideas for team work and not getting lost in your individual task.  Great for any company especially ones that work in teams for groups.  You can't help but improve productivity after reading this.  Highly recommended!

What a fantastic guide to All the Light We Cannot See. I read the original but got so much more from this book. It breaks down the characters and the chapters as well as themes and symbols. I used this for my book club and had some great discussion questions out of it. It was also a perfect quick reference. If you are looking for more out of the original or are looking for a quick read or help with a book club I highly recommend this. Well put together and a fast read with complete info.

Fantastic and well written summary and analysis guide to Tom Clancy Under Fire.  I loved the break down of the characters to give a more in-depth look.  The chapter summaries were great mixed with observations and an analysis.  At the end of the guide is a section perfect for book clubs or people wanting to get more out of the book.  It's a section on themes and symbols found in the story.  I especially liked the look at Seth's ADHD with the recurring patterns.  I missed that completely in the original book.Highly recommended for people looking to get more out of the original or for people in a hurry.  Would also make for some great discussion questions in a book club.

I love these books.  Great for kids or fans of Minecraft.  Gets my son to read and I can't ask for much more than that.  The illustrations and pictures are well done.  The formatting for Kindle makes it easy to read.  The story is fun and a blast to read.  I highly recommend this to all Minecraft fans.If you love Enderman then this is the Minecraft Diary for you.  Well done and a must have for your collection.

I love chromebooks.  Owned three (not hp).  Wanted a larger screen so got an hp.  My first HP the mouse didnt work, the 2nd one sent has a warped keyboard that makes writing feel off.  These things are remarkably cheaply made.  I avoid Toshiba due to poor build quality and will group hp right along with them.ASUS is built rock solid.  Going back to them.

I loved Radiant Angel but was left wanting more.  This companion fit what I was looking for perfectly.  Like many readers I had a few questions left unanswered.  The book offers an analysis of the chapters, character summary and a look at the symbols and hidden gems throughout the book.The book added a lot to my reading experience and I would highly recommend to any Nelson DeMille fan.  Perfect for book clubs were you need a quick look at the chapters and get some great discussion questions.  If your looking to enhance your experience or get a fast understanding of the book this is for you.

I love this book.  Super cute and well formatted for the Kindle.  Each poem has a well done graphic to match.  They are upbeat and fun and perfect for kids.  They have side lessons on top of being fun and remind me of the book Where the Sidewalk Ends.Not sure how many poems are in the book but well over 100.  Great for elementary to middle school kids.  Very clever and witty mixed with a good bit of humor.  Great for gifts, grandparents, parents and kids.  Highly recommended!

Very unique story and was a blast to read.  The author does a great job in laying out the plot and making both the characters and plot believable.  Robert Caron is relatable and his mission is a thrill ride.  One of the best books I have read in awhile.  Their are plenty of surprises along the way.  It has some darker moments but the author adds in a lighter side and just the right amount of humor to balance it out.  Very well done.I highly recommend this book.  Well written and very entertaining.  Well worth your time.

After reading The E-Myth and Rich Dad Poor Dad I can tell you that this book is right up there with the best of them.  If you are looking for self-help books for entrepreneurs leaning toward finical advice this is a must read.  Solid advice from experience.  You can't get better then that.  For other entrepreneurs or those looking for financial success in life this is a must read.  If your in sales, or looking to start your own business this is a great guide.

Fantastic analysis and summary.  I am a big fan of Goddesses Never Age and this book brought it all together.  Strong overview of the book picking up only the key ideas and main concepts.  I use this as a reference instead of having to dig through the original to find the information I am looking for.  Great guide to vibrant good health, better sex and aging without losing ourselves in the process.This book is life changing and a huge change to your life and health.  I highly recommend it.

One of the best books I have read in a long time.  What great insight into the Cold War era and everything going on around it.  Written by someone who was there.  I consider this a must read for anyone that was there, knows someone that was or is interested in the time.  Very informative and interesting.  It held my interest throughout. It's a moving tribute, story and the author makes history come to life.  Well done.  Loved it!

Well written and poetic. The prose is stunning at times. Take a look at the "look inside" feature on Amazon to see. Demi is a dynamic character that you can relate to. Depressing tone but also with that comes hope.I also like the way the author writes. It's dialog heavy and flows fast. It builds the characters and scenes quickly. I really enjoyed it and found it to be one of the best books I have read in a long time. Well worth a read. Highly recommended.

I loved the Blue Men of Minch!  Very unique and creative.  It reminded my a lot of other great young adult books like Percy Jackson.  Fantastic mix of humor, action, suspense and tension.  Well written and was a blast to read.  Looking forward to book 2 very much.  I loved the plot and all the characters and creativity.  Highly recommended!

Air Wick Scented Oil Air Freshener Vanilla Passion Refills smell wonderful and are a great value, especially on subscribe and save.I have 3 house dogs (a Dachshund, a Chihuahua, and a French Bulldog), but you would never know it unless you saw them. Air Wick Vanilla Passion Scented Oil Warmers are in large part responsible for that. They give my home a lovely, inviting, warm vanilla scent that is the first thing you smell when open the door. Perfect!I have one in each room of my home. I set the intensity dials at the midway point and they put out a nice fragrance that fills the room and they last about 2 weeks. I would never set mine past the halfway mark because it doesn't seem necessary or economical to do so as they only last about a week and a half at the higher settings. At the lower settings they will last around a month but the fragrance isn't noticeable enough for me at these settings.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FROM THE PRODUCT PACKAGING THAT YOU MIGHT FIND USEFUL:DIRECTIONS: 1. Unplug warmer. Remove empty bottle by gently pulling down from unit. Unscrew top from new bottle. 2. Insert fragrance bottle into warmer by pushing bottle up into device until click can be heard. 3. Plug warmer upright into outlet. Rotate plug if necessary. Unit will leak if plugged in sideways or upside down. When unplugged, keep unit upright. 4. To adjust fragrance intensity, rotate dial on top of warmer unit. Largest dot=maximum setting.

These address labels are well printed and a great value. The adhesive backing is of good quality and they stay stuck to envelopes and packages or whatever you need them to. I also appreciate how quickly I received my order. I would definitely order these again and I highly recommend them to others in need of address labels.TIP: Your Amazon account shipping address will be used for the labels unless you message the seller otherwise. You will need to go to your account, then your orders, find the order for the address labels and contact the seller/message the seller with your preferences.

I take Designs For Health Adrenal Complex for relief of adrenal fatigue and they work really well for me. I have tried various types of adrenal support products (see bottom of review) and I think Designs For Health Adrenal Complex is among the best and least expensive.Adrenal fatigue is caused by the adrenal glands being overworked due to stress, age, menopause, a hysterectomy, or other factors and can be diagnosed by testing a blood sample for inadequate levels of adrenal hormones such as estrogen, progesterone, testosterone, steroids, cortisone and cortisol (which is known as the "stress hormone" because it is used by the body to combat stress). Low cortisol is the most common associated finding in blood testing for adrenal fatigue.I also take 5 mg pregnenolone and 5 mg DHEA (the precursors/parents of all the reproductive hormones including testosterone and estrogen). Pregnenolone and DHEA supplementation is especially important for women after menopause or a hysterectomy, when your adrenals (not your ovaries) become your primary hormone producer. Your ovaries produced not only estrogen and progesterone, but testosterone as well and insurance companies will only pay for women to have estrogen and progesterone replacement, not testosterone, and doctors don't prescribe it. A woman's adrenal glands do produce some testosterone, but they quickly become overworked trying to produce sufficient amounts after menopause or a hysterectomy and this often leads to adrenal fatigue. Both pregnenolone and DHEA can convert into the needed testosterone for women.I take one of each (Designs For Health Adrenal Complex, pregnenolone, and DHEA) Monday through Friday and take a break from them on Saturday and Sunday (known as a "hormone holiday") because it keeps the body and adrenal glands from becoming too reliant on these supplements and reduces any risks associated with taking them. Some people take one of each per day for 3 weeks and then take a week off. I also take a good one a day multivitamin and mineral.HERE ARE SOME SIGNS AND SYMPTOMS OF ADRENAL FATIGUE:*Fatigue, lethargy, lack of energy; feeling tired for no reason*Body aches*Mild depression*Unexplained weight loss*Weight gain, especially around the middle, that you are unable to lose*Low blood pressure or Hypoglycemia*Lightheadedness when you get up from lying down*Unexplained hair loss*Reduced sex drive*Decreased ablility to remember things or concentrate*Pain in upper back or neck*Decreased ability to deal with stress*Nervousness, shaking, trembling or palpitations*Feeling better when removed from cause of stress, as when on a vacation*Difficulty getting up in the mornings*Needing coffee or caffeinated beverage to get going in the morning*Low energy in the mornings and in the afternoon between 3 to 5 pm*Feeling better for a short period after a meal*Feeling tired from 9 - 10 pm, but not wanting to go to bed*Craving salty, fatty, and high protein food such as meat and cheese*Craving sweet snacks*Food and or inhalant allergies*Dry and thin skin*Indigestion, constipation or diarrhea*In women, increased symptoms of PMS followed by heavy flow periods that stop, or nearly stop on the 4th day, only to start again on the 5th or 6th day.*Frequent respiratory illnesses (infections, bronchitis, etc.) that last longer than normal.OTHER THINGS THAT YOU CAN DO ALONG WITH TAKING Designs For Health Adrenal Complex THAT WILL ALSO HELP WITH ADRENAL FATIGUE:*Go to sleep by 10 p.m. and sleep until 9:00 a.m.*Do things you enjoy and laugh at least twice a day*Avoid coffee and caffeinated beverages*Always eat breakfast and eat early*Drink a glass of water with 1/2 to 1 teaspoon of salt in the morning*Avoid grains/bread*Avoid sweets and sugary fruits*Avoid starchy foods like potatoes*Avoid trans-fats such as french fries*Take vitamin C, pantothenic acid, magnesium, and vitamin E*Take 5mg pregnenolone and 5mg DHEA, as needed. NOTE: High dosages of DHEA and pregnenolone (generally more than 10 mg) can cause heart palpitations (feeling like your heart is racing) and irregular beats in some users.*Avoid over-exerting yourselfCONTINUED FROM TOP OF REVIEW:Adrenal support products that are made from plant extracts/vitamins are the least effective in my experience.Other adrenal support products contain whole adrenal gland extracts OR adrenal cortex extracts (or a combination of both like Designs For Health Adrenal Complex) from cows, pigs, and sheep. Both types work well for me and I often rotate my use of them.Glandular type support products are fewer and farther between than the plant extracts/vitamins type, but  I have found at least 3 glandular type products that I like and that work well for me and I purchase whichever is available with the lowest price at the time of purchase. But read the packaging/product information and make sure that the glandular materials used in these products are freeze dried and were obtained from certified BSE-free (Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy a.k.a. Mad Cow Disease) countries. Designs For Health Adrenal Complex meets both of these requirements, and in my opinion, is safe to use.The hormones released by the adrenal cortex (outer part of the adrenal gland) are necessary for life while those released by the adrenal medulla (inner part of the adrenal gland) are not.Five classes of steroid hormones, are produced in the adrenal cortex:1) glucocorticoids (corticosteroids involved in carbohydrate, protein, and fat metabolism, and having anti-inflammatory properties; includes cortisol, corticosterone, cortodoxone, and cortisone)2) mineralocorticoids (corticosteroids that regulate the balance of water and electrolytes in the body; includes aldosterone)3) progestins (progesterone)4) androgens (androstenedione, DHEA or Dehydroepiandrosterone, and testosterone)5) estrogens (includes estradiol, estrone, and estriol)The adrenal medulla (inner part of the adrenal gland) releases the hormones adrenaline and noradrenaline which are responsible for the fight or flight response. When we find ourselves in a stressful situation, adrenaline, along with noradrenaline, are largely responsible for the immediate reactions we feel, including increased heart rate, a surge of energy (which you might need to either run away from a dangerous situation, or fend off an attacker) and focused attention.Some people might experience increased heart rate/energy surges while taking adrenal support supplements containing whole gland extracts.

I have regularly color treated hair that is thick, wavy, and prone to frizziness and I use Hask Argan Oil hair products to keep my hair looking its best. I use the Hask Argan Oil from Morocco Repairing Shampoo and its companion conditioner and then twice a month or more I use this Hask Argan Oil from Morocco Intense Deep Conditioning Hair Treatment in place of the repairing conditioner because it gives an added boost of hydration and strength to dry, damaged, chemically treated or over-processed hair.Here is why I love Hask Argan Oil hair products:1) They are made with Moroccan Argan Oil obtained from the pressed seeds of argan fruit which grows from Moroccan Argan trees. This oil is vitamin and mineral rich and contains an unusually high concentration of Vitamin E and carotenes (a form of Vitamin A), both of which are necessary for healthy skin and hair. It is rapidly absorbed by hair, nourishing it and hydrating it and sealing in moisture by forming a non-evaporating layer around it. This smooths hair and prevents frizziness caused by humid conditions/weather. It also strengthens hair and promotes elasticity, preventing cuticle damage (split ends) and breakage while repairing existing damage.2) They also contain Keratin (the key structural component of hair) and Panthenol (a derivative of vitamin B5) which smooths and straightens hair and adds gloss and shine.3) They are ideal for dry, damaged, or color treated hair and they do a wonderful job of taming and smoothing my thick, wavy, color treated hair that is prone to frizziness and keeping me frizz free even in high humidity. And I can straighten my hair while blow drying it by using a Conair Professional Round Brush to grasp my hair at the root (with the brush underneath the hair and the hair on top of brush) and while carrying the brush through my hair from root to tip, I follow above the hair with my blow dryer. This dries my hair while straightening it at the same time and there is no need to use a flat iron which might further damage my hair. The end result is soft, straight, smooth, shiny, run your fingers through it hair.4) They have a fresh, clean, crisp, citrus scent and contain no sulfates or parabens.5) They are made in the USA which I always appreciate.6) Because Moroccan Argan Oil is one of the rarest oils in the world, most shampoos, conditioners and hair treatments that contain it are costly, but Hask Argan Oil from Morocco hair products are very affordable.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION THAT YOU MIGHT FIND USEFUL:DIRECTIONS (Hask Argan Oil from Morocco Intense Deep Conditioning Hair Treatment): Apply a generous amount of Argan Oil Intense Deep Conditioning Treatment to clean, wet hair. Massage into hair focusing on damaged areas. Let penetrate for 10 minutes. Rinse well. Style as usual.INGREDIENTS (Hask Argan Oil from Morocco Intense Deep Conditioning Hair Treatment): Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Lanolin, Quaternium-18, Argania Spinosa Kernal Oil (Argan), Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Oryza Sativa Protein, Siloxysilicate, Oryza Sativa Extract (Rice), Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Keratin (Keratin Protein), Silk Amino Acids, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Panthenol, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Juglans Nigra Leaf Extract (Black Walnut), Sodium PCA, Tetrasodium Edta, Citric Acid, Caramel, Yellow 5, DMDM Hydantoin, Fragrance.

My husband and I needed a clock with a larger display than the one we were currently using for our living area. We have had good luck with Westclox in the past and this new Westclox LED alarm clock fit the bill perfectly. It was affordable, it is easy to use, and has a large display that can be seen from anywhere in the room. The numbers on the display are about 1 and 3/4 inches tall. They are red in color and they are bright, but not overly bright.The overall dimensions of the clock itself are: 3 and 1/8 inches tall; 3 and 1/8 inches deep from front to back; and 6 and 1/4 inches long from one side to the other.The buttons to set the time and the alarm are conveniently located at the front bottom of the clock. There is a switch on the back to turn the alarm on and off. When the alarm is on there is an indicator light that will be lit on the display. There is also an indicator light for PM that is off in the AM.There is a snooze button on the top of the clock and when pressed it will silence the alarm for 9 minutes and then the alarm will resume. My husband and I had no need for the alarm or snooze feature since we are using the clock in our living area, but for anyone who needs these features, they work well and the alarm is loud enough.We really like the battery back up (one 9 volt alkaline battery, not included) in case of a power outage. The battery compartment is located on the bottom of the clock.The clock comes with a one year limited warranty that covers defects in materials and workmanship. You can send the clock  within a year of purchase to the repair center at NYL Holdings LLC in Fort Lauderdale, FL for repair or replacement. You must include a proof of purchase, either the original receipt or a photocopy, your return address, and a check or money order for $6.95 to cover the cost of shipping and handling.

This silk table runner is beautiful and very well made. Also, the bamboo and cherry blossom designs are woven into the silk fabric and will not wear or wash off, and the tassels are high quality.I love mine and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of one.

I just love this cute Boston Terrier and French Bulldog magnet featuring a reproduction of a painting by Louis Agassiz Fuertes. I have it on my my refrigerator. It looks great and the magnet is very strong. It should stay in place on whatever you place it on. It measures 2 and 1/8 inches tall by 3 and 1/8 inches wide. The magnet's artwork has a clear protective covering and it can be wiped/cleaned without damaging the artwork if it is ever necessary.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION YOU MIGHT FIND USEFUL:About the Artist: Louis Agassiz Fuertes (1874-1927) was an American ornithologist and illustrator. Fuertes decided to concentrate on painting birds as a career after meeting Elliott Coues in 1894 while on a trip to Washington, D.C. with the Cornell University Glee Club. He travelled to many countries in pursuit of birds, including Canada, Mexico, Jamaica and Ethiopia. And, in 1899, he accompanied E. H. Harriman on his famous exploration of the Alaska coastline. He lectured on ornithology at Cornell University from 1923, and the libraries there hold extensive collections of his artwork and personal papers.

I am a BIG fan of white musk frangrances. Noa, Eau de Toilette, by Cacharel is one of my favorites. It smells divine (more about the scent later) and can be worn for any occasion. It doesn't affect people with sensitivities to other fragrances. It garners compliments from both men and women (who almost always want to know what fragrance it is and where they can get it). And most importantly for me, my husband loves it on me.You may want to reapply it mid-day (I sometimes do) since it is an Eau de Toilette and is less concentrated/has less fragrance oils than Eau de parfum or perfume.As for the scent, it is a very soft, warm, feminine scent with top notes of white musk, peony, freesia, and peach skin, and middle notes of lily, ylang - ylang, and rose, and a woodsy base with touches of incense and coffee. (All fragrances have layers which the perfume industry refers to as top notes, middle notes, and base notes. Top notes are noticed as soon as you apply a fragrance. Middle notes emerge just before the top notes dissipate. Base notes become perceivable about 30 minutes after application.)ADDITIONAL INFORMATION THAT YOU MIGHT FIND USEFUL:Noa was launched by the design house of Cacharel in 1998 and was classified as a luxurious, gentle, floral fragrance, possessing a blend of fruit and spices. Cacharel is a French brand of ready-to-wear clothing, perfume and accessories. It was created in 1962 by Jean Bousquet, in Nmes, who founded the company of the same name in 1964. He took the name Cacharel from that of a native duck in the south of France. Cacharel was the first to give us designer fragrances at an affordable price. Their perfume line is now a division of L'Oreal.Noa, Eau de Toilette, by Cacharel is contained in a crystal clear round glass bottle with a pearl inside it.INGREDIENTS (Noa, Eau de Toilette, by Cacharel):  Alcohol, Parfum, Butylphenyl, Methylpropional, Hydroxytcitronellol, Alpha Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Coumarin, Citronellol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Linalool, Fernesol, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Benzoate.

I really like the Zyliss slotted turner, so much so that I bought an extra one. If you are looking for a good turner/spatula, I highly recommend this one.Here are the things that I think make this a great turner/spatula:1) The shape and style of the handle makes it comfortable and easy to hold and use, plus the handle has a hole for hanging the turner near your cook-stove or grill.2) ¾ inch of the edge of the turner is tapered silicone and it slides easily under eggs or whatever you are turning and is heat safe to 500 degrees Fahrenheit so it won't melt.  And it doesn't scratch the non-stick coating on my cookware and doesn't leave anything behind in the food as I have unfortunately experienced with other turners/spatulas that left tiny flakes or pieces of whatever they were made of in my food.3) The remaining length of the Zyliss slotted turner is made of sturdy nylon that can better support the weight of whatever you are turning. The nylon is also heat resistant to 500 degrees Fahrenheit.4) The turner is slotted so that excess liquid or grease can drain off.

I own several of these H.B. Smith Tools WDX77 High Pressure Hose Nozzles. They do spray with more pressure than a regular garden hose spray nozzle, but will not turn your garden hose into a pressure washer. But I still love them and here is why:1) They are well constructed and don't leak.2) The handle is wrapped in soft foam, is comfortable to hold, and requires no pressure or squeezing to operate because the water is turned on and off with a handle.3) They do a great job of cleaning off my patios.4) They are great for washing our cars and truck.5) The wide fan spray nozzle is great for watering the garden when held high above it.6) The wand fits nicely inside the entrance holes of my Martin Gourds when cleaning and rinsing out the insides of them.7) I much prefer these to regular garden hose spray nozzles because they function better.

I am a BIG fan of white musk fragrances. The Body Shop White Musk Eau de Parfum is one of my favorites. It smells heavenly (more about the scent later) and can be worn for any occasion. It has great lasting power throughout the day. It doesn't affect people with sensitivities to other fragrances. It garners compliments from both men and women (who almost always want to know what fragrance it is and where they can get it). And most importantly for me, my husband loves it on me.As for the scent, it is a very warm, soft, feminine scent with top notes of Ylang - Ylang, Galbanum and Basil, and middle notes of Jasmine, Rose, Musk and Lily, and base notes of Musk, Amber, Vanilla, Oakmoss, Vetiver, Peach, Patchouli, Rose, Iris, and Jasmine. (All fragrances have layers which the perfume industry refers to as top notes, middle notes, and base notes. Top notes are noticed as soon as you apply a fragrance. Middle notes emerge just before the top notes dissipate. Base notes become perceivable about 30 minutes after application.)ADDITIONAL INFORMATION THAT YOU MIGHT FIND USEFUL:The Body Shop White Musk was originally launced in 1981 and the scent was described as "soft, velvety and forever sensual". It is made by The Body Shop International plc, which has its headquarters in Littlehampton, West Sussex, England, and was founded in 1976 by Anita Roddick.The Body Shop International plc never tests on animals, and all of their products are 100% vegetarian. They have over 2,500 stores in over 60 markets worldwide and are now part of the L'Oréal corporate group.INGREDIENTS (The Body Shop White Musk Eau de Parfum): Alcohol Denat., Water, Fragrance, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, t-Butyl Alcohol, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Isoeugenol, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Evernia Prunastri (Oak Moss) Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Denatonium Benzoate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Eugenol, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Cinnamate, Limonene, Farnesol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Cinnamal, Citral.

I work outside year round and am exposed to the weather (rain, sleet and snow). I must tread through water, snow, mud, creeks, etc. to get to a job-site. For me, there is nothing worse than working all day with wet feet. To solve that problem, I wear these Hanz waterproof socks inside my work-boots and they do a great job of keeping my feet dry. They do their job and allow me to do mine with some degree of comfort.I have been wearing these socks for years and have seen the brand name go from Sealskinz to Hanz. But the product is identical and works the same. Only the name has changed. It is still the same great product which I highly recommend.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE NAME CHANGE FROM THE HANZ WEBSITE THAT YOU MIGHT FIND USEFUL:WHY THE CHANGE?“Made in the USA. It's important to us and to our customers – now, more than ever. Hanz Extremity Wear is committed to designing and manufacturing 100% of our products in the USA, while other manufacturers of waterproof socks and gloves have chosen to offshore their design and manufacturing.”WILL THERE BE ANY CHANGE TO THE PRODUCT OR INVENTORY?“There are no changes to the product. Only the name has changed. After we exhaust our existing stock (no later than February 21, 2013), any inventory replenishments will be shipped under the new Hanz brand. Even the packaging of the products is nearly identical so that they can be effectively merchandized together.”

I work outside year round and I wear Hot Chillys midweight base layer products, including these Hot Chillys Crewneck Thermals, under my work clothes to help keep me warm during the cold of winter in Tennessee.Here are some things that I really like about these Hot Chillys Crewneck Thermals:1) My work shirts go on easily over top of them.2) They feature an insulating double-layer construction to trap body heat and they do an excellent job of keeping me warm.4) They are made of polyester with flat seam construction so they cause me no skin irritation.5) They move with me and don't restrict my movement which enables me to do my job safely.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FROM THE HOT CHILLYS WEBSITE THAT YOU MIGHT FIND USEFUL :Hot Chilly's products have a warmth thermometer they call the "Warmth Factor" printed on the packaging indicating "mild, medium or hot" products.Midweight - Rated 6 and 8 on Hot Chillys Warmth Thermometer:Hot Chillys most popular products fall into this range and include their best performance BASE LAYER products as well as some MID LAYERS. Products with a warmth factor between 6 through 8 are medium warmth, midweight products designed for excellent moisture management and slightly greater warmth. Great for cold conditions and perfect for performing with you all day on the mountain.Mountain Weight - Rated 9 and 10 on our Warmth Thermometer:Excellent as a SECOND LAYER to wear over the top of base layer products when its really cold. Products with a warmth factor between 9 and 10 are Hot Chilly's warmest, heavy weight products designed for excellent moisture management in the most extremely cold conditions.

I really like these stainless steel pet ID tags. For me, the medium size has sufficient room for names and contact information and is also a good size for all of my dogs to wear (2 Dachshunds, a Chihuahua, and a French Bulldog). These tags are superior to others I have ordered in the past because:1) They are made with stainless steel and the hole for hanging the tag is reinforced making them more durable and longer lasting.2) The names and contact info are stamped into the stainless steel with deep die-stamping and then filled in with black enamel which makes the information easier to read if my dogs are ever lost and found by someone. And the deep die-stamping ensures that the names and contact information won't wear off as I have experienced with other tags on which the information was only lightly etched.3) These tags have a reflector on one side which will make my dogs easier to spot for motorists if, God forbid, they should ever be lost at night and end up in or near a roadway.4) They come with a split ring for attachment to the D-ring of my dog's collars.5) They are high quality and yet very affordable.The picture for the listing shows the pet's name on the first line, the owner's name on the second line, street address on the third line, city and state on the fourth line, and phone number on the fifth line. But you can have whatever you want engraved as long as it is within the character limits listed below:CHARACTER LIMITS FOR BOTH THE MEDIUM AND LARGE SIZE TAG:1st Line: up to 15 characters including spaces2nd Line: up to 17 characters including spaces3rd Line: up to 17 characters including spaces4th Line: up to 17 characters including spaces5th Line: up to 15 characters including spacesCHARACTER LIMITS FOR THE SMALL SIZE TAG:1st Line: up to 10 characters including spaces2nd Line: up to 12 characters including spaces3rd Line: up to 12 characters including spaces4th Line: up to 12 characters including spaces5th Line: up to 10 characters including spacesTo send your engraving info to the seller, go to "Your Account" at the top right side of the Amazon web page and then from the drop down menu select "Your Orders", find the order for the pet ID tag, click on the yellow button that says "Contact Seller", then under "#2 - Tell us more about your issue" select "Product Customization" from the drop down menu, click on the yellow "Write Message" button, then type in the provided text box "I would like my tag to read:" followed by lines 1-5 of your engraving information, and then click the yellow "Send E-mail" button.

This valance is listed in the title as Cambridge Navy Valance, but don't worry, it is navy and tan plaid just like the picture for the listing. It is 72" wide x 14" long and 100% cotton with a 2" rod pocket. It is well made with nice stitching and looks beautiful atop the window. It is exactly what I was looking for (something more on the masculine side for my husband's hobby room) and at an affordable price.NOTE: The care instructions say to wash in cold water and lay flat to dry, or dry clean. I am sure this is so that the valance will retain it's size. It is made of 100% cotton and does not appear to be pre-shrunk so I am certain it would shrink if you tried to dry it in the clothes dryer and would no longer fit your window.

This Rubbermaid gallon pitcher is of the same high quality that I have come to expect of all Rubbermaid products.It is MADE IN THE USA (by Rubbermaid Inc./Newell Rubbermaid in Huntersville, NC) of thick #5 plastic (a.k.a. polypropylene - the pitcher has the number 5 recycle mark on the bottom) that is durable and SAFE. It does not leach like some plastics and it DOES NOT contain BPA (or Bisphenol A, a synthetic compound used to make certain plastics and epoxy resins that has been proven to cause negative health effects in animal studies). Polypropylene is also used to make baby bottles and medicine bottles and is safe for use with hot liquids because it has a high melting point.The pitcher is 10 " tall, 6 ½" in circumference at the top, 5 ½" at the bottom, and 9" across from the tip of the pouring spout to the edge of the handle. It fits nicely in a gallon capacity shelf/compartment of the door of my refrigerator.The pitcher has graduated measurement marks on the side (1 quart, 2 quart, 3 quart, and 1 Gallon which is equal to 4 quarts).The lid fits snugly and can be adjusted to a pour, strain or closed position.I am very pleased with mine (I own two of these) and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a pitcher.

I love this basswood plank with bark edges. I bought two of these and used them to make a display shelf to hold my Native American artifacts (one for the backboard of the shelf and the other I cut up to make a shelf with a lip to attach to the backboard). I burned a Native American border across the top of  with a wood burning tool and in behind each artifact I tucked laminated cards containing information about each artifact.To hang the shelf, I attached two saw tooth hangers to the back. These basswood planks worked perfectly for this purpose and the shelf looks great.Basswood is perfect for any woodburning projects and I have used smaller versions of these rustic planks to make plaques with other Native American designs burned on them they couldn't have turned out any better.

These 11X14" Lawrence Frames wood shadow boxes are very well constructed and are perfect for displaying family heirlooms, collectibles, or other treasured items.I have five of these hanging in various places throughout my home. They have 1.75" of room between the glass front and the backboard and I have used them to display the following:*A picture of my Grandmother with a short bio alongside one of her crocheted doilies and her antique ruby and diamond ring.*A picture of my Grandfather with a short bio and a song he often played alongside his banjo pick and antique smoking pipe.*A picture of my Great-Grandmother with a short bio alongside an antique place setting from her silverware and one of her antique monogrammed napkins.*Two of the shadow boxes hold a collection of Native American carvings and bead-work.I did not use the velcro system to secure my treasured items because I did not want to place adhesive velcro on them. Also, for the backgroud, I chose a color and/or pattern of acid free scrapbook paper appropriate for my items and cut it to the same dimensions as the backboard by tracing around the backboard with a pencil on my paper. Then I hot-glued the paper to the existing backboard. To secure the items to the backboard, I used pipe cleaners which are strong, but soft and won't damage my items. If you decide to use pipe cleaners to secure your items, I suggest using colors that are as close to the color of the items or the background as you can find so that the pipe cleaners blend in and don't stand out.HOW I USED PIPE CLEANERS TO SECURE MY TREASURED ITEMS: The pipe cleaners were threaded through from the back of the backboard through holes I pre-drilled and then over and around the items and back down through a hole on the other side of the items and out the back again. I then twisted the two ends together behind the backboard and taped them over with clear packing tape to hold them down flat and keep them secure (these twisted ends get covered/hidden later in the process). Before drilling the holes I first placed the items in the order I wanted them on the backing, then decided where the best areas to secure them were (you may want to fasten down an item in more than one area), and then used a pencil to mark the spots on the paper (on either side of the items) to drill, and then removed the items and drilled the small holes. Once the holes are drilled, put the items back in place and start fastening them down with the pipe cleaners.For the pictures and bios, I used double-sided tape to secure them to an appropriate size piece of foam board and then hot-glued the foam board to the backing so that they would stand off the backing somewhat.I also taped a large envelope across the backside of the shadow box that contained additional information about the items, and in the case of family heirlooms, a family tree which showed the direct line of descent from my earliest known ancestor to my Grandparents to me. This envelope also conceals the twisted together, taped down ends of the pipe cleaners.Once finished, these shadow boxes looked very professional and I have never had an item fall or shift position inside them. Everything is very secure with the pipe cleaners holding them in place.

Febreze Noticeables oil warmer was an ingenious idea. It is two oil warmers in one unit and it uses fragrance refills that are two chambered and filled with two similar fragrances side by side.  The warmer alternates between the two fragrances so that when your nose gets used to one fragrance and it becomes less noticeable, the warmer then switches to the other fragrance and you once again notice a pleasant scent coming from the warmer. The Vanilla Starlight & Moonlight Vanilla fragrance refill is my favorite of all the scents. Both vanilla fragrances are very soothing and they have a good throw and fill a space nicely.You can adjust the fragrance intensity from low to high with a switch on the back of the warmer to suit your own tastes. Each fragrance refill lasts 30 days left on high intensity (or longer if left on low). I have mine on high. I use subscribe and save so I get new refills monthly from Amazon. They are delivered to my doorstep with my other subscribe and save items and I get 15% off of the price. I love it.My  warmers stay in my outlets snugly. But for anyone who has a problem with theirs not staying in, you probably need new outlets. If an outlet is worn out, plugs will easily come out of them. You want an outlet with good tension so that your plugs have a snug fit and good connection. GFI's are generally tighter than other outlets.There is actually a tool (Woodhead Receptacle Tension Tester) used to test outlets for proper tension. But if things are falling out of your outlets then it is probably a safe bet that you need new ones and you probably don't need an expensive tool to tell you that.
